   20: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   21: %%% Purpose: Test suite for the 'lists' module.
   22: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   23: 
   24: -module(lists_SUITE).
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %% Test server specific exports
   28: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   29: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   30: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   31: 
   32: %% Test cases must be exported.
   33: -export([member/1, reverse/1,
   34: 	 keymember/1, keysearch_keyfind/1,
   35: 	 keystore/1, keytake/1, keyreplace/1,
   36: 	 append_1/1, append_2/1,
   37: 	 seq_loop/1, seq_2/1, seq_3/1, seq_2_e/1, seq_3_e/1,
   38: 
   39: 	 sublist_2/1, sublist_3/1, sublist_2_e/1, sublist_3_e/1,
   40: 	 flatten_1/1, flatten_2/1, flatten_1_e/1, flatten_2_e/1,
   41: 	 dropwhile/1, takewhile/1,
   42: 	 sort_1/1, sort_stable/1, merge/1, rmerge/1, sort_rand/1,
   43: 	 usort_1/1, usort_stable/1, umerge/1, rumerge/1,usort_rand/1,
   44: 	 keymerge/1, rkeymerge/1,
   45: 	 keysort_1/1, keysort_i/1, keysort_stable/1,
   46: 	 keysort_rand/1, keysort_error/1,
   47: 	 ukeymerge/1, rukeymerge/1,
   48: 	 ukeysort_1/1, ukeysort_i/1, ukeysort_stable/1,
   49: 	 ukeysort_rand/1, ukeysort_error/1,
   50: 	 funmerge/1, rfunmerge/1,
   51: 	 funsort_1/1, funsort_stable/1, funsort_rand/1,
   52: 	 funsort_error/1,
   53: 	 ufunmerge/1, rufunmerge/1,
   54: 	 ufunsort_1/1, ufunsort_stable/1, ufunsort_rand/1,
   55: 	 ufunsort_error/1,
   56: 	 uniq_1/1, uniq_2/1,
   57: 	 zip_unzip/1, zip_unzip3/1, zipwith/1, zipwith3/1,
   58: 	 zip_fail/1, zip_trim/1, zip_pad/1,
   59: 	 zip3_fail/1, zip3_trim/1, zip3_pad/1,
   60: 	 zipwith_fail/1, zipwith_trim/1, zipwith_pad/1,
   61: 	 zipwith3_fail/1, zipwith3_trim/1, zipwith3_pad/1,
   62: 	 filter_partition/1, 
   63: 	 join/1,
   64: 	 otp_5939/1, otp_6023/1, otp_6606/1, otp_7230/1,
   65: 	 suffix/1, subtract/1, droplast/1, search/1, hof/1,
   66: 	 enumerate/1, error_info/1]).
   67: 
   68: %% Sort randomized lists until stopped.
   69: %%
   70: %% If you update some of the sort or merge functions, you should
   71: %% definitely let sort_loop work for a couple of hours or days. Try
   72: %% both sort_loop/0 and sort_loop/1 with a small argument (30-50 say).
   73: 
   74: -export([sort_loop/0, sort_loop/1, sloop/1]).
   75: 
   76: %% Internal export.
   77: -export([make_fun/1]).
   78: 
   79: %%
   80: %% all/1
   81: %%
   82: suite() ->
   83:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   84:      {timetrap,{minutes,4}}].
   85: 
   86: all() -> 
   87:     [{group, append},
   88:      {group, key},
   89:      {group, sort},
   90:      {group, usort},
   91:      {group, keysort},
   92:      {group, ukeysort},
   93:      {group, uniq},
   94:      {group, funsort},
   95:      {group, ufunsort},
   96:      {group, sublist},
   97:      {group, flatten},
   98:      {group, seq},
   99:      {group, tickets},
  100:      {group, zip},
  101:      {group, misc}].
  102: 
  103: groups() -> 
  104:     [{append, [parallel], [append_1, append_2]},
  105:      {usort, [parallel],
  106:       [umerge, rumerge, usort_1, usort_rand, usort_stable]},
  107:      {keysort, [parallel],
  108:       [keymerge, rkeymerge, keysort_1, keysort_rand,
  109:        keysort_i, keysort_stable, keysort_error]},
  110:      {key, [parallel], [keymember, keysearch_keyfind, keystore,
  111: 			keytake, keyreplace]},
  112:      {sort,[parallel],[merge, rmerge, sort_1, sort_rand]},
  113:      {ukeysort, [parallel],
  114:       [ukeymerge, rukeymerge, ukeysort_1, ukeysort_rand,
  115:        ukeysort_i, ukeysort_stable, ukeysort_error]},
  116:      {funsort, [parallel],
  117:       [funmerge, rfunmerge, funsort_1, funsort_stable,
  118:        funsort_error, funsort_rand]},
  119:      {ufunsort, [parallel],
  120:       [ufunmerge, rufunmerge, ufunsort_1, ufunsort_stable,
  121:        ufunsort_error, ufunsort_rand]},
  122:      {seq, [parallel], [seq_loop, seq_2, seq_3, seq_2_e, seq_3_e]},
  123:      {sublist, [parallel],
  124:       [sublist_2, sublist_3, sublist_2_e, sublist_3_e]},
  125:      {flatten, [parallel],
  126:       [flatten_1, flatten_2, flatten_1_e, flatten_2_e]},
  127:      {tickets, [parallel], [otp_5939, otp_6023, otp_6606, otp_7230]},
  128:      {zip, [parallel], [zip_unzip, zip_unzip3, zipwith, zipwith3,
  129: 			zip_fail, zip_trim, zip_pad,
  130: 		        zip3_fail, zip3_trim, zip3_pad,
  131: 		        zipwith_fail, zipwith_trim, zipwith_pad,
  132: 		        zipwith3_fail, zipwith3_trim, zipwith3_pad]},
  133:      {uniq, [parallel], [uniq_1, uniq_2]},
  134:      {misc, [parallel], [reverse, member, dropwhile, takewhile,
  135: 			 filter_partition, suffix, subtract, join,
  136: 			 hof, droplast, search, enumerate, error_info]}
  137:     ].
  138: 
  139: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  140:     Config.
  141: 
  142: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  143:     ok.
  144: 
  145: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  146:     Config.
  147: 
  148: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  149:     Config.
  150: 
  151: 
  152: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  153:     Config.
  154: 
  155: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
  156:     ok.
  157: 
  158: %%
  159: %% Test cases starts here.
  160: %%
  161: 
  162: append_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  163:     "abcdef"=lists:append(["abc","def"]),
  164:     [hej, du,[glade, [bagare]]]=
  165: 	lists:append([[hej], [du], [[glade, [bagare]]]]),
  166:     [10, [elem]]=lists:append([[10], [[elem]]]),
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: append_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     "abcdef"=lists:append("abc", "def"),
  171:     [hej, du]=lists:append([hej], [du]),
  172:     [10, [elem]]=lists:append([10], [[elem]]),
  173: 
  174:     %% Trapping, both crashing and otherwise.
  175:     [append_trapping_1(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 20)],
  176: 
  177:     ok.
  178: 
  179: append_trapping_1(N) ->
  180:     List = lists:duplicate(N + (1 bsl N), gurka),
  181:     ImproperList = List ++ crash,
  182: 
  183:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch (ImproperList ++ [])),
  184: 
  185:     [3, 2, 1 | List] = lists:reverse(List ++ [1, 2, 3]),
  186: 
  187:     ok.
  188: 
  189: %% Tests the lists:reverse() implementation. The function is
  190: %% `non-blocking', and only processes a fixed number of elements at a
  191: %% time.
  192: reverse(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  193:     reverse_test(0),
  194:     reverse_test(1),
  195:     reverse_test(2),
  196:     reverse_test(128),
  197:     reverse_test(256),
  198:     reverse_test(1000),
  199:     reverse_test(1998),
  200:     reverse_test(1999),
  201:     reverse_test(2000),
  202:     reverse_test(2001),
  203:     reverse_test(3998),
  204:     reverse_test(3999),
  205:     reverse_test(4000),
  206:     reverse_test(4001),
  207:     reverse_test(60001),
  208:     reverse_test(100007),
  209:     ok.
  210: 
  211: reverse_test(0) ->
  212:     case lists:reverse([]) of
  213: 	[] ->
  214: 	    ok;
  215: 	_Other ->
  216: 	    error
  217:     end;
  218: reverse_test(Num) ->
  219:     List0 = ['The Element'|lists:duplicate(Num, 'Ele')],
  220:     List = lists:reverse(List0),
  221:     ['Ele'|_] = List,
  222:     'The Element' = lists:last(List),
  223:     List0 = lists:reverse(List),
  224:     ok.
  225: 
  226: %% Test the lists:member() implementation.  This test case depends on
  227: %% lists:reverse() to work, wich is tested in a separate test case.
  228: member(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  229:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:member(45, {a,b,c})),
  230:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:member(45, [0|non_list_tail])),
  231:     false = lists:member(4233, []),
  232:     member_test(1),
  233:     member_test(100),
  234:     member_test(256),
  235:     member_test(1000),
  236:     member_test(1998),
  237:     member_test(1999),
  238:     member_test(2000),
  239:     member_test(2001),
  240:     member_test(3998),
  241:     member_test(3999),
  242:     member_test(4000),
  243:     member_test(4001),
  244:     member_test(100008),
  245:     ok.
  246: 
  247: member_test(Num) ->
  248:     List0 = ['The Element'|lists:duplicate(Num, 'Elem')],
  249:     true = lists:member('The Element', List0),
  250:     true = lists:member('Elem', List0),
  251:     false = lists:member(arne_anka, List0),
  252:     false = lists:member({a,b,c}, List0),
  253:     List = lists:reverse(List0),
  254:     true = lists:member('The Element', List),
  255:     true = lists:member('Elem', List),
  256:     false = lists:member(arne_anka, List),
  257:     false = lists:member({a,b,c}, List).
  258: 
  259: keymember(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     false = lists:keymember(anything_goes, 1, []),
  261:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:keymember(anything_goes, -1, [])),
  262:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:keymember(anything_goes, 0, [])),
  263:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:keymember(anything_goes, 1, {1,2,3})),
  264:     List = [{52.0,a},{-19,b,c},{37.5,d},an_atom,42.0,{39},{45,{x,y,z}}],
  265: 
  266:     false = lists:keymember(333, 5, List),
  267:     false = lists:keymember(333, 999, List),
  268:     false = lists:keymember(37, 1, List),
  269: 
  270:     true = lists:keymember(52.0, 1, List),
  271:     true = lists:keymember(52, 1, List),
  272:     true = lists:keymember(-19, 1, List),
  273:     true = lists:keymember(-19.0, 1, List),
  274:     true = lists:keymember(37.5, 1, List),
  275:     true = lists:keymember(39, 1, List),
  276:     true = lists:keymember(39.0, 1, List),
  277:     true = lists:keymember(45, 1, List),
  278:     true = lists:keymember(45.0, 1, List),
  279: 
  280:     true = lists:keymember(a, 2, List),
  281:     true = lists:keymember(b, 2, List),
  282:     true = lists:keymember(c, 3, List),
  283:     true = lists:keymember(d, 2, List),
  284:     true = lists:keymember({x,y,z}, 2, List),
  285: 
  286:     Long0 = lists:seq(1, 100007),
  287:     false = lists:keymember(kalle, 1, Long0),
  288:     Long = lists:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [{1/E,E}|A] end, [], Long0),
  289:     true = lists:keymember(1, 2, Long),
  290:     true = lists:keymember(2, 2, Long),
  291:     true = lists:keymember(1.0, 2, Long),
  292:     true = lists:keymember(2.0, 2, Long),
  293:     true = lists:keymember(100006, 2, Long),
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: keysearch_keyfind(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  297:     false = key_search_find(anything_goes, 1, []),
  298:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch key_search_find(anything_goes, -1, [])),
  299:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch key_search_find(anything_goes, 0, [])),
  300:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch key_search_find(anything_goes, 1, {1,2,3})),
  301: 
  302:     First = {x,42.0},
  303:     Second = {y,-77},
  304:     Third = {z,[a,b,c],{5.0}},
  305:     List = [First,Second,Third],
  306: 
  307:     false = key_search_find(333, 1, []),
  308:     false = key_search_find(333, 5, List),
  309:     false = key_search_find(333, 999, List),
  310:     false = key_search_find(37, 1, List),
  311: 
  312:     {value,First} = key_search_find(42, 2, List),
  313:     {value,First} = key_search_find(42.0, 2, List),
  314: 
  315:     {value,Second} = key_search_find(-77, 2, List),
  316:     {value,Second} = key_search_find(-77.0, 2, List),
  317: 
  318:     {value,Third} = key_search_find(z, 1, List),
  319:     {value,Third} = key_search_find([a,b,c], 2, List),
  320:     {value,Third} = key_search_find({5}, 3, List),
  321:     {value,Third} = key_search_find({5.0}, 3, List),
  322: 
  323:     Long0 = lists:seq(1, 100007),
  324:     false = key_search_find(kalle, 1, Long0),
  325:     Long = lists:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [{1/E,float(E)}|A] end, [], Long0),
  326:     {value,{_,1.0}} = key_search_find(1, 2, Long),
  327:     {value,{_,1.0}} = key_search_find(1.0, 2, Long),
  328:     {value,{_,2.0}} = key_search_find(2, 2, Long),
  329:     {value,{_,2.0}} = key_search_find(2.0, 2, Long),
  330:     {value,{_,33988.0}} = key_search_find(33988, 2, Long),
  331:     {value,{_,33988.0}} = key_search_find(33988.0, 2, Long),
  332:     ok.
  333: 
  334: %% Test both lists:keysearch/3 and lists:keyfind/3. The only
  335: %% difference between these two functions is that lists:keysearch/3
  336: %% wraps a successfully returned tuple in a value tuple.
  337: %%
  338: key_search_find(Key, Pos, List) ->
  339:     case lists:keyfind(Key, Pos, List) of
  340: 	false ->
  341: 	    false = lists:keysearch(Key, Pos, List);
  342: 	Tuple when is_tuple(Tuple) ->
  343: 	    {value,Tuple} = lists:keysearch(Key, Pos, List)
  344:     end.
  345: 
  346: dropwhile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  347:     F = fun(C) -> C =:= $@ end,
  348: 
  349:     [] = lists:dropwhile(F, []),
  350:     [a] = lists:dropwhile(F, [a]),
  351:     [a,b] = lists:dropwhile(F, [a,b]),
  352:     [a,b,c] = lists:dropwhile(F, [a,b,c]),
  353: 
  354:     [] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@]),
  355:     [] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@]),
  356:     [a,$@] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,a,$@]),
  357: 
  358:     [$k] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$k]),
  359:     [$k,$l] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@,$k,$l]),
  360:     [a] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@,$@,a]),
  361: 
  362:     [a,$@,b] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,a,$@,b]),
  363:     [a,$@,b] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@,a,$@,b]),
  364:     [a,$@,b] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@,$@,a,$@,b]),
  365: 
  366:     Long = lists:seq(1, 1024),
  367:     Shorter = lists:seq(800, 1024),
  368: 
  369:     Shorter = lists:dropwhile(fun(E) -> E < 800 end, Long),
  370: 
  371:     ok.
  372: 
  373: takewhile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  374:     F = fun(C) -> C =/= $@ end,
  375: 
  376:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, []),
  377:     [a] = lists:takewhile(F, [a]),
  378:     [a,b] = lists:takewhile(F, [a,b]),
  379:     [a,b,c] = lists:takewhile(F, [a,b,c]),
  380: 
  381:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@]),
  382:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@,$@]),
  383:     [a] = lists:takewhile(F, [a,$@]),
  384: 
  385:     [$k] = lists:takewhile(F, [$k,$@]),
  386:     [$k,$l] = lists:takewhile(F, [$k,$l,$@,$@]),
  387:     [a] = lists:takewhile(F, [a,$@,$@,$@]),
  388: 
  389:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@,a,$@,b]),
  390:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@,$@,a,$@,b]),
  391:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@,$@,$@,a,$@,b]),
  392: 
  393:     Long = lists:seq(1, 1024),
  394:     Shorter = lists:seq(1, 400),
  395: 
  396:     Shorter = lists:takewhile(fun(E) -> E =< 400 end, Long),
  397: 
  398:     ok.
  399: 
  400: keystore(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  401:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keystore(key, 0, [], {1})),
  402:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keystore(key, 1, {}, {})),
  403:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keystore(key, 1, {a,b}, {})),
  404:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keystore(a, 2, [{1,a}], b)),
  405:     T = {k,17},
  406:     [T] = lists:keystore(a, 2, [], T),
  407:     [{1,a},{2,b},{k,17}] = lists:keystore(c, 2, [{1,a},{2,b}],T),
  408:     L = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}],
  409:     [{k,17},{2,b},{3,c}] = lists:keystore(a, 2, L, T),
  410:     [{1,a},{k,17},{3,c}] = lists:keystore(b, 2, L, T),
  411:     [{1,a},{2,b},{k,17}] = lists:keystore(c, 2, L, T),
  412:     [{2,b}] = lists:keystore(a, 2, [{1,a}], {2,b}),
  413:     [{1,a}] = lists:keystore(foo, 1, [], {1,a}),
  414:     ok.
  415: 
  416: keytake(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  417:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keytake(key, 0, [])),
  418:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keytake(key, 1, {})),
  419:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keytake(key, 1, {a,b})),
  420:     false = lists:keytake(key, 2, [{a}]),
  421:     false = lists:keytake(key, 1, [a]),
  422:     false = lists:keytake(k, 1, []),
  423:     false = lists:keytake(k, 1, [{a},{b},{c}]),
  424:     L = [{a,1},{b,2},{c,3}],
  425:     {value,{a,1},[{b,2},{c,3}]} = lists:keytake(1, 2, L),
  426:     {value,{b,2},[{a,1},{c,3}]} = lists:keytake(2, 2, L),
  427:     {value,{c,3},[{a,1},{b,2}]} = lists:keytake(3, 2, L),
  428:     false = lists:keytake(4, 2, L),
  429:     ok.
  430: 
  431: %% Test lists:keyreplace/4.
  432: keyreplace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  433:     [{new,42}] = lists:keyreplace(k, 1, [{k,1}], {new,42}),
  434:     [atom,{new,a,b}] = lists:keyreplace(k, 1, [atom,{k,1}], {new,a,b}),
  435:     [a,{x,y,z}] = lists:keyreplace(a, 5, [a,{x,y,z}], {no,use}),
  436: 
  437:     %% Error cases.
  438:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keyreplace(k, 1, [], not_tuple)),
  439:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keyreplace(k, 0, [], {a,b})),
  440:     ok.
  441: 
  442: merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  443: 
  444:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
  445: 
  446:     %% merge list of lists
  447:     [] = lists:merge([]),
  448:     [] = lists:merge([[]]),
  449:     [] = lists:merge([[],[]]),
  450:     [] = lists:merge([[],[],[]]),
  451:     [1] = lists:merge([[1]]),
  452:     [1,1,2,2] = lists:merge([[1,2],[1,2]]),
  453:     [1] = lists:merge([[1],[],[]]),
  454:     [1] = lists:merge([[],[1],[]]),
  455:     [1] = lists:merge([[],[],[1]]),
  456:     [1,2] = lists:merge([[1],[2],[]]),
  457:     [1,2] = lists:merge([[1],[],[2]]),
  458:     [1,2] = lists:merge([[],[1],[2]]),
  459:     [1,2,3,4,5,6] = lists:merge([[1,2],[],[5,6],[],[3,4],[]]),
  460:     [1,2,3,4] = lists:merge([[4],[3],[2],[1]]),
  461:     [1,2,3,4,5] = lists:merge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5]]),
  462:     [1,2,3,4,5,6] = lists:merge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5],[6]]),
  463:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9] =
  464: 	lists:merge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5],[6],[7],[8],[9]]),
  465:     Seq = lists:seq(1,100),
  466:     true = Seq == lists:merge(lists:map(fun(E) -> [E] end, Seq)),
  467: 
  468:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([Singleton])),
  469:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([Singleton, []])),
  470:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([[], Singleton])),
  471:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([Singleton, [], []])),
  472:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([[], Singleton, []])),
  473:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([[], [], Singleton])),
  474: 
  475:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a])),
  476:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, b])),
  477:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, []])),
  478:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[], b])),
  479:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [1, 2, 3]])),
  480:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[1, 2, 3], b])),
  481:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, b, c])),
  482:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, b, []])),
  483:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [], c])),
  484:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [], []])),
  485:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[], b, c])),
  486:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[], b, []])),
  487:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[], [], c])),
  488:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, b, [1, 2, 3]])),
  489:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [1, 2, 3], c])),
  490:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6]])),
  491:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[1, 2, 3], b, c])),
  492:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6]])),
  493:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c])),
  494: 
  495:     Two = [1,2],
  496:     Six = [1,2,3,4,5,6],
  497: 
  498:     %% 2-way merge
  499:     [] = lists:merge([], []),
  500:     Two = lists:merge(Two, []),
  501:     Two = lists:merge([], Two),
  502:     Six = lists:merge([1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
  503:     Six = lists:merge([2,4,6], [1,3,5]),
  504:     Six = lists:merge([1,2,3], [4,5,6]),
  505:     Six = lists:merge([4,5,6], [1,2,3]),
  506:     Six = lists:merge([1,2,5],[3,4,6]),
  507:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:merge([1,3,5,7], [2]),
  508:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:merge([1,3,5,7], [2,4]),
  509:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:merge([1,3,5,7], [2,4,6]),
  510:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:merge([2], [1,3,5,7]),
  511:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:merge([2,4], [1,3,5,7]),
  512:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:merge([2,4,6], [1,3,5,7]),
  513: 
  514:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([], Singleton)),
  515:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge(Singleton, [])),
  516: 
  517:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(a, b)),
  518:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(a, [])),
  519:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([], b)),
  520:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(a, [1, 2, 3])),
  521:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([1, 2, 3], b)),
  522: 
  523:     %% 3-way merge
  524:     [] = lists:merge3([], [], []),
  525:     Two = lists:merge3([], [], Two),
  526:     Two = lists:merge3([], Two, []),
  527:     Two = lists:merge3(Two, [], []),
  528:     Six = lists:merge3([], [1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
  529:     Six = lists:merge3([1,3,5], [], [2,4,6]),
  530:     Six = lists:merge3([1,3,5], [2,4,6], []),
  531:     Nine = lists:merge3([1,4,7],[2,5,8],[3,6,9]),
  532:     Nine = lists:merge3([1,4,7],[3,6,9],[2,5,8]),
  533:     Nine = lists:merge3([3,6,9],[1,4,7],[2,5,8]),
  534:     Nine = lists:merge3([4,5,6],[1,2,3],[7,8,9]),
  535:     Nine = lists:merge3([1,2,3],[4,5,6],[7,8,9]),
  536:     Nine = lists:merge3([7,8,9],[4,5,6],[1,2,3]),
  537:     Nine = lists:merge3([4,5,6],[7,8,9],[1,2,3]),
  538: 
  539:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge3([], [], Singleton)),
  540:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge3([], Singleton, [])),
  541:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge3(Singleton, [], [])),
  542: 
  543:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, b, c)),
  544:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, b, [])),
  545:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, [], c)),
  546:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, [], [])),
  547:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3([], b, [])),
  548:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3([], [], c)),
  549:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, b, [1, 2, 3])),
  550:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, [1, 2, 3], c)),
  551:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6])),
  552:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3([1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6])),
  553:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c)),
  554: 
  555:     ok.
  556: 
  557: %% reverse merge functions
  558: rmerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  559: 
  560:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
  561:     Two = [2,1],
  562:     Six = [6,5,4,3,2,1],
  563: 
  564:     %% 2-way reversed merge
  565:     [] = lists:rmerge([], []),
  566:     Two = lists:rmerge(Two, []),
  567:     Two = lists:rmerge([], Two),
  568:     Six = lists:rmerge([5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  569:     Six = lists:rmerge([6,4,2], [5,3,1]),
  570:     Six = lists:rmerge([3,2,1], [6,5,4]),
  571:     Six = lists:rmerge([6,5,4], [3,2,1]),
  572:     Six = lists:rmerge([4,3,2],[6,5,1]),
  573:     [7,6,5,3,1] = lists:rmerge([7,5,3,1], [6]),
  574:     [7,6,5,4,3,1] = lists:rmerge([7,5,3,1], [6,4]),
  575:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge([7,5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  576:     [7,5,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge([2], [7,5,3,1]),
  577:     [7,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge([4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
  578:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge([6,4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
  579: 
  580:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge([], Singleton)),
  581:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge(Singleton, [])),
  582: 
  583:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(a, b)),
  584:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(a, [])),
  585:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge([], b)),
  586:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(a, [1, 2, 3])),
  587:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge([1, 2, 3], b)),
  588: 
  589:     Nine = [9,8,7,6,5,4,3,2,1],
  590: 
  591:     %% 3-way reversed merge
  592:     [] = lists:rmerge3([], [], []),
  593:     Two = lists:rmerge3([], [], Two),
  594:     Two = lists:rmerge3([], Two, []),
  595:     Two = lists:rmerge3(Two, [], []),
  596:     Six = lists:rmerge3([], [5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  597:     Six = lists:rmerge3([5,3,1], [], [6,4,2]),
  598:     Six = lists:rmerge3([5,3,1], [6,4,2], []),
  599:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([7,4,1],[8,5,2],[9,6,3]),
  600:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([7,4,1],[9,6,3],[8,5,2]),
  601:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([9,6,3],[7,4,1],[8,5,2]),
  602:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([6,5,4],[3,2,1],[9,8,7]),
  603:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([3,2,1],[6,5,4],[9,8,7]),
  604:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([9,8,7],[6,5,4],[3,2,1]),
  605:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([6,5,4],[9,8,7],[3,2,1]),
  606: 
  607:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge3([], [], Singleton)),
  608:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge3([], Singleton, [])),
  609:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge3(Singleton, [], [])),
  610: 
  611:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, b, c)),
  612:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, b, [])),
  613:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, [], c)),
  614:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, [], [])),
  615:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3([], b, [])),
  616:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3([], [], c)),
  617:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, b, [1, 2, 3])),
  618:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], c)),
  619:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6])),
  620:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3([1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6])),
  621:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c)),
  622: 
  623:     ok.
  624: 
  625: sort_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  626:     [] = lists:sort([]),
  627:     [a] = lists:sort([a]),
  628:     [a,a] = lists:sort([a,a]),
  629:     [a,b] = lists:sort([a,b]),
  630:     [a,b] = lists:sort([b,a]),
  631:     [1,1] = lists:sort([1,1]),
  632:     [1,1,2,3] = lists:sort([1,1,3,2]),
  633:     [1,2,3,3] = lists:sort([3,3,1,2]),
  634:     [1,1,1,1] = lists:sort([1,1,1,1]),
  635:     [1,1,1,2,2,2,3,3,3] = lists:sort([3,3,3,2,2,2,1,1,1]),
  636:     [1,1,1,2,2,2,3,3,3] = lists:sort([1,1,1,2,2,2,3,3,3]),
  637: 
  638:     lists:foreach(fun check/1, perms([1,2,3])),
  639:     lists:foreach(fun check/1, perms([1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8])),
  640:     ok.
  641: 
  642: %% sort/1 on big randomized lists
  643: sort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  644:     ok = check(biglist(10)),
  645:     ok = check(biglist(100)),
  646:     ok = check(biglist(1000)),
  647:     ok = check(biglist(10000)),
  648:     ok.
  649: 
  650: %% sort/1 was really stable for a while - the order of equal elements
  651: %% was kept - but since the performance suffered a bit, this "feature"
  652: %% was removed.
  653: 
  654: %% sort/1 should be stable for equal terms.
  655: sort_stable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  656:     ok = check_stability(bigfunlist(10)),
  657:     ok = check_stability(bigfunlist(100)),
  658:     ok = check_stability(bigfunlist(1000)),
  659:     case erlang:system_info(modified_timing_level) of
  660: 	undefined -> ok = check_stability(bigfunlist(10000));
  661: 	_ -> ok
  662:     end,
  663:     ok.
  664: 
  665: check([]) ->
  666:     ok;
  667: check(L) ->
  668:     S = lists:sort(L),
  669:     case {length(L) == length(S), check(hd(S), tl(S))} of
  670: 	{true,ok} ->
  671: 	    ok;
  672: 	_ ->
  673: 	    io:format("~w~n", [L]),
  674: 	    erlang:error(check)
  675:     end.
  676: 
  677: check(_A, []) ->
  678:     ok;
  679: check(A, [B | L]) when A =< B ->
  680:     check(B, L);
  681: check(_A, _L) ->
  682:     no.
  683: 
  684: %% The check that sort/1 is stable is no longer used.
  685: %% Equal elements are no longer always kept in order.
  686: check_stability(L) ->
  687:     S = lists:sort(L),
  688:     LP = explicit_pid(L),
  689:     SP = explicit_pid(S),
  690:     check_sorted(1, 2, LP, SP).
  691: 
  692: explicit_pid(L) ->
  693:     lists:reverse(expl_pid(L, [])).
  694: 
  695: expl_pid([{I,F} | T], L) when is_function(F) ->
  696:     expl_pid(T, [{I,fun_pid(F)} | L]);
  697: expl_pid([], L) ->
  698:     L.
  699: 
  700: 
  701: usort_1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  702:     [] = lists:usort([]),
  703:     [1] = lists:usort([1]),
  704:     [1] = lists:usort([1,1]),
  705:     [1] = lists:usort([1,1,1,1,1]),
  706:     [1,2] = lists:usort([1,2]),
  707:     [1,2] = lists:usort([1,2,1]),
  708:     [1,2] = lists:usort([1,2,2]),
  709:     [1,2,3] = lists:usort([1,3,2]),
  710:     [1,3] = lists:usort([3,1,3]),
  711:     [0,1,3] = lists:usort([3,1,0]),
  712:     [1,2,3] = lists:usort([3,1,2]),
  713:     [1,2] = lists:usort([2,1,1]),
  714:     [1,2] = lists:usort([2,1]),
  715:     [0,3,4,8,9] = lists:usort([3,8,9,0,9,4]),
  716: 
  717:     lists:foreach(fun ucheck/1, perms([1,2,3])),
  718:     lists:foreach(fun ucheck/1, perms([1,2,3,4,5,6,2,1])),
  719: 
  720:     ok.
  721: 
  722: umerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  723:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
  724: 
  725:     %% merge list of lists
  726:     [] = lists:umerge([]),
  727:     [] = lists:umerge([[]]),
  728:     [] = lists:umerge([[],[]]),
  729:     [] = lists:umerge([[],[],[]]),
  730:     [1] = lists:umerge([[1]]),
  731:     [1,2] = lists:umerge([[1,2],[1,2]]),
  732:     [1] = lists:umerge([[1],[],[]]),
  733:     [1] = lists:umerge([[],[1],[]]),
  734:     [1] = lists:umerge([[],[],[1]]),
  735:     [1,2] = lists:umerge([[1],[2],[]]),
  736:     [1,2] = lists:umerge([[1],[],[2]]),
  737:     [1,2] = lists:umerge([[],[1],[2]]),
  738:     [1,2,3,4,5,6] = lists:umerge([[1,2],[],[5,6],[],[3,4],[]]),
  739:     [1,2,3,4] = lists:umerge([[4],[3],[2],[1]]),
  740:     [1,2,3,4,5] = lists:umerge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5]]),
  741:     [1,2,3,4,5,6] = lists:umerge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5],[6]]),
  742:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9] =
  743:         lists:umerge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5],[6],[7],[8],[9]]),
  744:     [1,2,4,6,8] = lists:umerge([[1,2],[2,4,6,8]]),
  745:     Seq = lists:seq(1,100),
  746:     true = Seq == lists:umerge(lists:map(fun(E) -> [E] end, Seq)),
  747: 
  748:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([Singleton])),
  749:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([Singleton, []])),
  750:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([[], Singleton])),
  751:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([Singleton, [], []])),
  752:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([[], Singleton, []])),
  753:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([[], [], Singleton])),
  754: 
  755:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a])),
  756:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, b])),
  757:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, []])),
  758:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[], b])),
  759:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [1, 2, 3]])),
  760:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[1, 2, 3], b])),
  761:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, b, c])),
  762:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, b, []])),
  763:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [], c])),
  764:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [], []])),
  765:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[], b, c])),
  766:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[], b, []])),
  767:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[], [], c])),
  768:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, b, [1, 2, 3]])),
  769:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [1, 2, 3], c])),
  770:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6]])),
  771:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[1, 2, 3], b, c])),
  772:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6]])),
  773:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c])),
  774: 
  775:     Two = [1,2],
  776:     Six = [1,2,3,4,5,6],
  777: 
  778:     %% 2-way unique merge
  779:     [] = lists:umerge([], []),
  780:     Two = lists:umerge(Two, []),
  781:     Two = lists:umerge([], Two),
  782:     Six = lists:umerge([1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
  783:     Six = lists:umerge([2,4,6], [1,3,5]),
  784:     Six = lists:umerge([1,2,3], [4,5,6]),
  785:     Six = lists:umerge([4,5,6], [1,2,3]),
  786:     Six = lists:umerge([1,2,5],[3,4,6]),
  787:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge([1,3,5,7], [2]),
  788:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge([1,3,5,7], [2,4]),
  789:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge([1,3,5,7], [2,4,6]),
  790:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge([2], [1,3,5,7]),
  791:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge([2,4], [1,3,5,7]),
  792:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge([2,4,6], [1,3,5,7]),
  793: 
  794:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge([1,2,3,5,7], [2]),
  795:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge([1,2,3,4,5,7], [2,4]),
  796:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge([1,2,3,4,5,6,7], [2,4,6]),
  797:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge([2], [1,2,3,5,7]),
  798:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge([2,4], [1,2,3,4,5,7]),
  799:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge([2,4,6], [1,2,3,4,5,6,7]),
  800: 
  801:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([], Singleton)),
  802:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge(Singleton, [])),
  803: 
  804:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(a, b)),
  805:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(a, [])),
  806:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([], b)),
  807:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(a, [1, 2, 3])),
  808:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([1, 2, 3], b)),
  809: 
  810:     %% 3-way unique merge
  811:     [] = lists:umerge3([], [], []),
  812:     Two = lists:umerge3([], [], Two),
  813:     Two = lists:umerge3([], Two, []),
  814:     Two = lists:umerge3(Two, [], []),
  815:     Six = lists:umerge3([], [1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
  816:     Six = lists:umerge3([1,3,5], [], [2,4,6]),
  817:     Six = lists:umerge3([1,3,5], [2,4,6], []),
  818:     Nine = lists:umerge3([1,4,7],[2,5,8],[3,6,9]),
  819:     Nine = lists:umerge3([1,4,7],[3,6,9],[2,5,8]),
  820:     Nine = lists:umerge3([3,6,9],[1,4,7],[2,5,8]),
  821:     Nine = lists:umerge3([4,5,6],[1,2,3],[7,8,9]),
  822:     Nine = lists:umerge3([1,2,3],[4,5,6],[7,8,9]),
  823:     Nine = lists:umerge3([7,8,9],[4,5,6],[1,2,3]),
  824:     Nine = lists:umerge3([4,5,6],[7,8,9],[1,2,3]),
  825: 
  826:     [1,2,3] = lists:umerge3([1,2,3],[1,2,3],[1,2,3]),
  827:     [1,2,3,4] = lists:umerge3([2,3,4],[1,2,3],[2,3,4]),
  828:     [1,2,3] = lists:umerge3([1,2,3],[2,3],[1,2,3]),
  829:     [1,2,3,4] = lists:umerge3([2,3,4],[3,4],[1,2,3]),
  830: 
  831:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge3([], [], Singleton)),
  832:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge3([], Singleton, [])),
  833:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge3(Singleton, [], [])),
  834: 
  835:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, b, c)),
  836:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, b, [])),
  837:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, [], c)),
  838:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, [], [])),
  839:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3([], b, [])),
  840:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3([], [], c)),
  841:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, b, [1, 2, 3])),
  842:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], c)),
  843:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6])),
  844:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3([1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6])),
  845:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c)),
  846: 
  847:     ok.
  848: 
  849: rumerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  850:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
  851: 
  852:     Two = [2,1],
  853:     Six = [6,5,4,3,2,1],
  854: 
  855:     %% 2-way reversed unique merge
  856:     [] = lists:rumerge([], []),
  857:     Two = lists:rumerge(Two, []),
  858:     Two = lists:rumerge([], Two),
  859:     Six = lists:rumerge([5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  860:     Six = lists:rumerge([6,4,2], [5,3,1]),
  861:     Six = lists:rumerge([3,2,1], [6,5,4]),
  862:     Six = lists:rumerge([6,5,4], [3,2,1]),
  863:     Six = lists:rumerge([4,3,2],[6,5,1]),
  864:     [7,6,5,3,1] = lists:rumerge([7,5,3,1], [6]),
  865:     [7,6,5,4,3,1] = lists:rumerge([7,5,3,1], [6,4]),
  866:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([7,5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  867:     [7,5,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([2], [7,5,3,1]),
  868:     [7,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
  869:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([6,4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
  870: 
  871:     [7,6,5,3,1] = lists:rumerge([7,6,5,3,1], [6]),
  872:     [7,6,5,4,3,1] = lists:rumerge([7,6,5,4,3,1], [6,4]),
  873:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([7,6,5,4,3,2,1], [6,4,2]),
  874:     [7,5,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([2], [7,5,3,2,1]),
  875:     [7,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([4,2], [7,5,4,3,2,1]),
  876:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([6,4,2], [7,6,5,4,3,2,1]),
  877: 
  878:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge([], Singleton)),
  879:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge(Singleton, [])),
  880: 
  881:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(a, b)),
  882:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(a, [])),
  883:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge([], b)),
  884:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(a, [1, 2, 3])),
  885:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge([1, 2, 3], b)),
  886: 
  887:     Nine = [9,8,7,6,5,4,3,2,1],
  888: 
  889:     %% 3-way reversed unique merge
  890:     [] = lists:rumerge3([], [], []),
  891:     Two = lists:rumerge3([], [], Two),
  892:     Two = lists:rumerge3([], Two, []),
  893:     Two = lists:rumerge3(Two, [], []),
  894:     Six = lists:rumerge3([], [5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  895:     Six = lists:rumerge3([5,3,1], [], [6,4,2]),
  896:     Six = lists:rumerge3([5,3,1], [6,4,2], []),
  897:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([7,4,1],[8,5,2],[9,6,3]),
  898:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([7,4,1],[9,6,3],[8,5,2]),
  899:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([9,6,3],[7,4,1],[8,5,2]),
  900:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([6,5,4],[3,2,1],[9,8,7]),
  901:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([3,2,1],[6,5,4],[9,8,7]),
  902:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([9,8,7],[6,5,4],[3,2,1]),
  903:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([6,5,4],[9,8,7],[3,2,1]),
  904: 
  905:     [3,2,1] = lists:rumerge3([3,2,1],[3,2,1],[3,2,1]),
  906:     [4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge3([4,3,2],[3,2,1],[3,2,1]),
  907:     [5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge3([4,3,2],[5,4,3,2],[5,4,3,2,1]),
  908:     [6,5,4,3,2] = lists:rumerge3([4,3,2],[5,4,3,2],[6,5,4,3]),
  909: 
  910:     L1 = [c,d,e],
  911:     L2 = [b,c,d],
  912:     true =
  913: 	lists:umerge(L1, L2) == 
  914: 	lists:reverse(lists:rumerge(lists:reverse(L1), lists:reverse(L2))),
  915: 
  916:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge3([], [], Singleton)),
  917:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge3([], Singleton, [])),
  918:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge3(Singleton, [], [])),
  919: 
  920:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, b, c)),
  921:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, b, [])),
  922:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, [], c)),
  923:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, [], [])),
  924:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3([], b, [])),
  925:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3([], [], c)),
  926:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, b, [1, 2, 3])),
  927:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], c)),
  928:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6])),
  929:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3([1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6])),
  930:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c)),
  931: 
  932:     ok.
  933: 
  934: %% usort/1 on big randomized lists.
  935: usort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  936:     ok = ucheck(biglist(10)),
  937:     ok = ucheck(biglist(100)),
  938:     ok = ucheck(biglist(1000)),
  939:     ok = ucheck(biglist(10000)),
  940: 
  941:     ok = ucheck(ubiglist(10)),
  942:     ok = ucheck(ubiglist(100)),
  943:     ok = ucheck(ubiglist(1000)),
  944:     ok = ucheck(ubiglist(10000)),
  945:     ok.
  946: 
  947: %% usort/1 should keep the first duplicate.
  948: usort_stable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  949:     ok = ucheck_stability(bigfunlist(3)),
  950:     ok = ucheck_stability(bigfunlist(10)),
  951:     ok = ucheck_stability(bigfunlist(100)),
  952:     ok = ucheck_stability(bigfunlist(1000)),
  953:     case erlang:system_info(modified_timing_level) of
  954: 	undefined -> ok = ucheck_stability(bigfunlist(10000));
  955: 	_ -> ok
  956:     end,
  957:     ok.
  958: 
  959: ucheck([]) ->
  960:     ok;
  961: ucheck(L) ->
  962:     S = lists:usort(L),
  963:     case ucheck(hd(S), tl(S)) of
  964: 	ok ->
  965: 	    ok;
  966: 	_ ->
  967: 	    io:format("~w~n", [L]),
  968: 	    erlang:error(ucheck)
  969:     end.
  970: 
  971: ucheck(_A, []) ->
  972:     ok;
  973: ucheck(A, [B | L]) when A < B ->
  974:     ucheck(B, L);
  975: ucheck(_A, _L) ->
  976:     no.
  977: 
  978: %% Check that usort/1 is stable and correct relative ukeysort/2.
  979: ucheck_stability(L) ->
  980:     S = no_dups(lsort(L)),
  981:     U = lists:usort(L),
  982:     check_stab(L, U, S, "usort/1", "ukeysort/2").
  983: 
  984: 
  985: %% Key merge two lists.
  986: keymerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  987: 
  988:     Singleton = id([{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}]),
  989:     Two = [{1,a},{2,b}],
  990:     Six = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}],
  991: 
  992:     %% 2-way keymerge
  993:     [] = lists:keymerge(1, [], []),
  994:     Two = lists:keymerge(1, Two, []),
  995:     Two = lists:keymerge(1, [], Two),
  996:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e}], [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
  997:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e}]),
  998:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}], [{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}]),
  999:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}], [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]),
 1000:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{5,e}],[{3,c},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1001:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1002: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b}]),
 1003:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1004: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b},{4,d}]),
 1005:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1006: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1007:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1008: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1009:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1010: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1011:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1012: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1013: 
 1014:     [{b,2},{c,11},{c,12},{c,21},{c,22},{e,5}] =
 1015: 	lists:keymerge(1,[{c,11},{c,12},{e,5}], [{b,2},{c,21},{c,22}]),
 1016: 
 1017:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:keymerge(1, Singleton, [])),
 1018:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:keymerge(1, [], Singleton)),
 1019: 
 1020:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, a, b)),
 1021:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, a, [])),
 1022:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, [], b)),
 1023:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, a, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}])),
 1024:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}], b)),
 1025: 
 1026:     ok.
 1027: 
 1028: %% Reverse key merge two lists.
 1029: rkeymerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1030: 
 1031:     Singleton = id([{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}]),
 1032:     Two = [{2,b},{1,a}],
 1033:     Six = [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}],
 1034: 
 1035:     %% 2-way reversed keymerge
 1036:     [] = lists:rkeymerge(1, [], []),
 1037:     Two = lists:rkeymerge(1, Two, []),
 1038:     Two = lists:rkeymerge(1, [], Two),
 1039:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
 1040:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], [{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1041:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}], [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d}]),
 1042:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d}], [{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1043:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{4,d},{3,c},{2,b}],[{6,f},{5,e},{1,a}]),
 1044:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1045: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f}]),
 1046:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1047: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d}]),
 1048:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1049: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
 1050:     [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1051: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1052:     [{7,g},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1053: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{4,d},{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1054:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1055: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1056: 
 1057:     L1 = [{c,11},{c,12},{e,5}],
 1058:     L2 = [{b,2},{c,21},{c,22}],
 1059:     true =
 1060: 	lists:keymerge(1, L1, L2) == 
 1061: 	lists:reverse(lists:rkeymerge(1,lists:reverse(L1), 
 1062: 				      lists:reverse(L2))),
 1063: 
 1064:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rkeymerge(1, Singleton, [])),
 1065:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rkeymerge(1, [], Singleton)),
 1066: 
 1067:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, a, b)),
 1068:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, a, [])),
 1069:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, [], b)),
 1070:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, a, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}])),
 1071:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}], b)),
 1072: 
 1073:     ok.
 1074: 
 1075: keysort_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1076:     ok = keysort_check(1, [], []),
 1077:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{a,b}], [{a,b}]),
 1078:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{a,b},{a,b}], [{a,b},{a,b}]),
 1079:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{a,b},{b,c}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1080:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{b,c},{a,b}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1081:     ok = keysort_check(1,
 1082: 		       [{1,e},{3,f},{2,y},{0,z},{x,14}],
 1083: 		       [{0,z},{1,e},{2,y},{3,f},{x,14}]),
 1084:     ok = keysort_check(1,
 1085: 		       [{1,a},{1,a},{1,a},{1,a}],
 1086: 		       [{1,a},{1,a},{1,a},{1,a}]),
 1087: 
 1088:     [{b,1},{c,1}] = lists:keysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1}]),
 1089:     [{a,0},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4}] =
 1090: 	lists:keysort(1, [{d,4},{c,3},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1091:     [{a,0},{b,1},{b,2},{c,1}] =
 1092: 	lists:keysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1093:     [{a,0},{b,1},{b,2},{c,1},{d,4}] =
 1094: 	lists:keysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,2},{a,0},{d,4}]),
 1095: 
 1096:     SFun = fun(L) -> fun(X) -> keysort_check(1, X, L) end end,
 1097:     L1 = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}],
 1098:     lists:foreach(SFun(L1), perms(L1)),
 1099:     L2 = [{1,a},{1,a},{2,b}],
 1100:     lists:foreach(SFun(L2), perms(L2)),
 1101:     L3 = [{1,a},{1,a},{1,a},{2,b}],
 1102:     lists:foreach(SFun(L3), perms(L3)),
 1103:     L4 = [{a,1},{a,1},{b,2},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4},{e,5},{f,6}],
 1104:     lists:foreach(SFun(L4), perms(L4)),
 1105: 
 1106:     ok.
 1107: 
 1108: %% keysort should be stable
 1109: keysort_stable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1110:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{1,b},{1,c}], [{1,b},{1,c}]),
 1111:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{1,c},{1,b}], [{1,c},{1,b}]),
 1112:     ok = keysort_check(1,
 1113: 		       [{1,c},{1,b},{2,x},{3,p},{2,a}],
 1114: 		       [{1,c},{1,b},{2,x},{2,a},{3,p}]),
 1115:     ok = keysort_check(1,
 1116: 		       [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a},{1,a}],
 1117: 		       [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a},{1,a}]),
 1118:     ok.
 1119: 
 1120: %% keysort should exit when given bad arguments
 1121: keysort_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1122:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(0, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1123:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(3, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1124:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(1.5, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1125:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(x, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1126:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(x, [])),
 1127:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(x, [{1,b}])),
 1128:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(1, [a,b])),
 1129:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(1, [{1,b} | {1,c}])),
 1130:     ok.
 1131: 
 1132: %% keysort with other key than first element
 1133: keysort_i(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1134:     ok = keysort_check(2, [{a,2},{b,1},{c,3}], [{b,1},{a,2},{c,3}]),
 1135:     ok.
 1136: 
 1137: %% keysort on big randomized lists
 1138: keysort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1139:     ok = keysort_check3(1, biglist(10)),
 1140:     ok = keysort_check3(1, biglist(100)),
 1141:     ok = keysort_check3(1, biglist(1000)),
 1142:     ok = keysort_check3(1, biglist(10000)),
 1143: 
 1144:     ok = keysort_check3(2, biglist(10)),
 1145:     ok = keysort_check3(2, biglist(100)),
 1146:     ok = keysort_check3(2, biglist(1000)),
 1147:     ok = keysort_check3(2, biglist(10000)),
 1148:     ok.
 1149: 
 1150: %%% Keysort a list, check that the returned list is what we expected,
 1151: %%% and that it is actually sorted.
 1152: keysort_check(I, Input, Expected) ->
 1153:     Expected = lists:keysort(I, Input),
 1154:     check_sorted(I, Input, Expected).
 1155: 
 1156: keysort_check3(I, Input) ->
 1157:     check_sorted(I, 3, Input, lists:keysort(I, Input)).
 1158: 
 1159: check_sorted(I, Input, L) ->
 1160:     check_sorted(I, I, Input, L).
 1161: 
 1162: %%% Check that a list is keysorted by element I. Elements comparing equal
 1163: %%% should be sorted according to element J.
 1164: check_sorted(_I, _J, _Input, []) ->
 1165:     ok;
 1166: check_sorted(I, J, Input, [A | Rest]) ->
 1167:     case catch check_sorted1(I, J, A, Rest) of
 1168: 	{'EXIT', _} ->
 1169: 	    io:format("~w~n", [Input]),
 1170: 	    erlang:error(check_sorted);
 1171: 	Reply ->
 1172: 	    Reply
 1173:     end.
 1174: 
 1175: check_sorted1(_I, _J, _A, []) ->
 1176:     ok;
 1177: check_sorted1(I, J, A, [B | Rest]) ->
 1178:     ok = keycompare(I, J, A, B),
 1179:     check_sorted1(I, J, B, Rest).
 1180: 
 1181: keycompare(I, _J, A, B) when element(I, A) < element(I, B) ->
 1182:     ok;
 1183: keycompare(I, J, A, B) when element(I, A) == element(I, B), 
 1184: 			    element(J, A) =< element(J, B) ->
 1185:     ok.
 1186: 
 1187: 
 1188: %% Merge two lists while removing duplicates.
 1189: ukeymerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1190: 
 1191:     Singleton = id([{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}]),
 1192:     Two = [{1,a},{2,b}],
 1193:     Six = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}],
 1194: 
 1195:     %% 2-way unique keymerge
 1196:     [] = lists:ukeymerge(1, [], []),
 1197:     Two = lists:ukeymerge(1, Two, []),
 1198:     Two = lists:ukeymerge(1, [], Two),
 1199:     [] = lists:ukeymerge(1, [], []),
 1200:     Two = lists:ukeymerge(1, Two, []),
 1201:     Two = lists:ukeymerge(1, [], Two),
 1202:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e}], [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1203:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e}]),
 1204:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}], [{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}]),
 1205:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}], [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]),
 1206:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{5,e}],[{3,c},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1207:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1208: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b}]),
 1209:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1210: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b},{4,d}]),
 1211:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1212: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1213:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1214: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1215:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1216: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1217:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1218: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1219: 
 1220:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1221: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b}]),
 1222:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1223: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}], 
 1224: 			[{2,b},{4,d}]),
 1225:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1226: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}], 
 1227: 			[{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1228:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1229: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1230:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1231: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d}], 
 1232: 			[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1233:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1234: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], 
 1235: 			[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}]),
 1236: 
 1237:     L1 = [{a,1},{a,3},{a,5},{a,7}],
 1238:     L2 = [{b,1},{b,3},{b,5},{b,7}],
 1239:     L1 = lists:ukeymerge(2, L1, L2),
 1240: 
 1241:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:ukeymerge(1, Singleton, [])),
 1242:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:ukeymerge(1, [], Singleton)),
 1243: 
 1244:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, a, b)),
 1245:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, a, [])),
 1246:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, [], b)),
 1247:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, a, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}])),
 1248:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}], b)),
 1249: 
 1250:     ok.
 1251: 
 1252: %% Reverse merge two lists while removing duplicates.
 1253: rukeymerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1254: 
 1255:     Singleton = id([{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}]),
 1256:     Two = [{2,b},{1,a}],
 1257:     Six = [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}],
 1258: 
 1259:     %% 2-way reversed unique keymerge
 1260:     [] = lists:rukeymerge(1, [], []),
 1261:     Two = lists:rukeymerge(1, Two, []),
 1262:     Two = lists:rukeymerge(1, [], Two),
 1263:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
 1264:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], [{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1265:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}], [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d}]),
 1266:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d}], [{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1267:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{4,d},{3,c},{2,b}],[{6,f},{5,e},{1,a}]),
 1268:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1269: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f}]),
 1270:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1271: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d}]),
 1272:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1273: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
 1274:     [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1275: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1276:     [{7,g},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1277: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{4,d},{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1278:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1279: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1280: 
 1281:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1282: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f}]),
 1283:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1284: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{1,a}], 
 1285: 			 [{6,f},{4,d}]),
 1286:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1287: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}], 
 1288: 			 [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
 1289:     [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1290: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1291:     [{7,g},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1292: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{4,d},{2,b}], 
 1293: 			 [{7,g},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1294:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1295: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], 
 1296: 			 [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1297: 
 1298:     L1 = [{a,1},{a,3},{a,5},{a,7}],
 1299:     L2 = [{b,1},{b,3},{b,5},{b,7}],
 1300:     true =
 1301: 	lists:ukeymerge(2, L1, L2) == 
 1302: 	lists:reverse(lists:rukeymerge(2, lists:reverse(L1), 
 1303: 				       lists:reverse(L2))),
 1304: 
 1305:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rukeymerge(1, Singleton, [])),
 1306:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rukeymerge(1, [], Singleton)),
 1307: 
 1308:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, a, b)),
 1309:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, a, [])),
 1310:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, [], b)),
 1311:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, a, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}])),
 1312:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}], b)),
 1313: 
 1314:     ok.
 1315: 
 1316: ukeysort_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1317:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [], []),
 1318:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{a,b}], [{a,b}]),
 1319:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{a,b},{a,b}], [{a,b}]),
 1320:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{a,b},{b,c}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1321:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{b,c},{a,b}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1322:     ok = ukeysort_check(1,
 1323: 			[{1,e},{3,f},{2,y},{0,z},{x,14}],
 1324: 			[{0,z},{1,e},{2,y},{3,f},{x,14}]),
 1325:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{1,a},{1,a},{1,a},{1,a}], [{1,a}]),
 1326: 
 1327:     L1 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a}],
 1328:     L1u = lists:ukeysort(1, L1),
 1329:     L2 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a}],
 1330:     L2u = lists:ukeysort(1, L2),
 1331:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L1, L2),
 1332: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L1u, L2u)),
 1333:     L3 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a},{2,a}],
 1334:     L3u = lists:ukeysort(1, L3),
 1335:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L3, L2),
 1336: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L3u, L2u)),
 1337:     L4 = [{1,b},{1,a}],
 1338:     L4u = lists:ukeysort(1, L4),
 1339:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L1, L4),
 1340: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L1u, L4u)),
 1341:     L5 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a},{2,a}],
 1342:     L5u = lists:ukeysort(1, L5),
 1343:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, [], L5),
 1344: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, [], L5u)),
 1345:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L5, []),
 1346: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L5u, [])),
 1347:     L6 = [{3,a}],
 1348:     L6u = lists:ukeysort(1, L6),
 1349:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L5, L6),
 1350: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L5u, L6u)),
 1351: 
 1352:     [{b,1},{c,1}] = lists:ukeysort(1, [{c,1},{c,1},{c,1},{c,1},{b,1}]),
 1353:     [{a,0},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4}] =
 1354: 	lists:ukeysort(1, [{d,4},{c,3},{b,2},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1355:     [{a,0},{b,1},{c,1}] =
 1356: 	lists:ukeysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,1},{b,2},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1357:     [{a,0},{b,1},{c,1},{d,4}] =
 1358: 	lists:ukeysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,2},{a,0},{a,0},{d,4},{d,4}]),
 1359: 
 1360:     SFun = fun(L) -> fun(X) -> ukeysort_check(2, X, L) end end,
 1361:     PL = [{a,1},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4},{e,5},{f,6}],
 1362:     Ps = perms([{a,1},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4},{e,5},{f,6},{b,2},{a,1}]),
 1363:     lists:foreach(SFun(PL), Ps),
 1364: 
 1365:     M1L = [{1,a},{1,a},{2,b}],
 1366:     M1s = [{1,a},{2,b}],
 1367:     lists:foreach(SFun(M1s), perms(M1L)),
 1368:     M2L = [{1,a},{2,b},{2,b}],
 1369:     M2s = [{1,a},{2,b}],
 1370:     lists:foreach(SFun(M2s), perms(M2L)),
 1371:     M3 = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}],
 1372:     lists:foreach(SFun(M3), perms(M3)),
 1373: 
 1374:     ok.
 1375: 
 1376: %% ukeysort should keep the first duplicate.
 1377: ukeysort_stable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1378:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{1,b},{1,c}], [{1,b}]),
 1379:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{1,c},{1,b}], [{1,c}]),
 1380:     ok = ukeysort_check(1,
 1381: 			[{1,c},{1,b},{2,x},{3,p},{2,a}],
 1382: 			[{1,c},{2,x},{3,p}]),
 1383: 
 1384:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{1,a},{1,b},{1,b}], [{1,a}]),
 1385:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{2,a},{1,b},{2,a}], [{1,b},{2,a}]),
 1386: 
 1387:     ok = ukeysort_check_stability(bigfunlist(3)),
 1388:     ok = ukeysort_check_stability(bigfunlist(10)),
 1389:     ok = ukeysort_check_stability(bigfunlist(100)),
 1390:     ok = ukeysort_check_stability(bigfunlist(1000)),
 1391:     case erlang:system_info(modified_timing_level) of
 1392: 	undefined -> ok = ukeysort_check_stability(bigfunlist(10000));
 1393: 	_ -> ok
 1394:     end,
 1395:     ok.
 1396: 
 1397: %% ukeysort should exit when given bad arguments.
 1398: ukeysort_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1399:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(0, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1400:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(3, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1401:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(1.5, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1402:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(x, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1403:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(x, [])),
 1404:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(x, [{1,b}])),
 1405:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(1, [a,b])),
 1406:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(1, [{1,b} | {1,c}])),
 1407:     ok.
 1408: 
 1409: %% ukeysort with other key than first element.
 1410: ukeysort_i(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1411:     ok = ukeysort_check(2, [{a,2},{b,1},{c,3}], [{b,1},{a,2},{c,3}]),
 1412:     ok.
 1413: 
 1414: %% ukeysort on big randomized lists.
 1415: ukeysort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1416:     ok = ukeysort_check3(2, biglist(10)),
 1417:     ok = ukeysort_check3(2, biglist(100)),
 1418:     ok = ukeysort_check3(2, biglist(1000)),
 1419:     ok = ukeysort_check3(2, biglist(10000)),
 1420: 
 1421:     ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, ubiglist(10)),
 1422:     ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, ubiglist(100)),
 1423:     ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, ubiglist(1000)),
 1424:     ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, ubiglist(10000)),
 1425:     ok.
 1426: 
 1427: %% Check that ukeysort/2 is stable and correct relative keysort/2.
 1428: %% (this is not affected by the fact that keysort/2 is no longer really 
 1429: %%  stable; ucheck_stability/1 checks ukeysort/2 (and usort/1, of course))
 1430: gen_ukeysort_check(I, Input) ->
 1431:     U = lists:ukeysort(I, Input),
 1432:     S = lists:keysort(I, Input),
 1433:     case U == no_dups_keys(S, I) of
 1434: 	true ->
 1435: 	    ok;
 1436: 	false ->
 1437: 	    io:format("~w~n", [Input]),
 1438: 	    erlang:error(gen_ukeysort_check)
 1439:     end.
 1440: 
 1441: %% Used for checking that the first copy is kept.
 1442: ukeysort_check_stability(L) ->
 1443:     I = 1,
 1444:     U = lists:ukeysort(I, L),
 1445:     S = no_dups_keys(lkeysort(I, L), I),
 1446:     check_stab(L, U, S, "ukeysort/2", "usort/2").
 1447: 
 1448: %%% Uniquely keysort a list, check that the returned list is what we
 1449: %%% expected, and that it is actually sorted.
 1450: ukeysort_check(I, Input, Expected) ->
 1451:     Expected = lists:ukeysort(I, Input),
 1452:     ucheck_sorted(I, Input, Expected).
 1453: 
 1454: ukeysort_check3(I, Input) ->
 1455:     ucheck_sorted(I, 3, Input, lists:ukeysort(I, Input)).
 1456: 
 1457: ucheck_sorted(I, Input, L) ->
 1458:     ucheck_sorted(I, I, Input, L).
 1459: 
 1460: %%% Check that a list is ukeysorted by element I. Elements comparing
 1461: %%% equal should be sorted according to element J.
 1462: ucheck_sorted(_I, _J, _Input, []) ->
 1463:     ok;
 1464: ucheck_sorted(I, J, Input, [A | Rest]) ->
 1465:     case catch ucheck_sorted1(I, J, A, Rest) of
 1466: 	{'EXIT', _} ->
 1467: 	    io:format("~w~n", [Input]),
 1468: 	    erlang:error(ucheck_sorted);
 1469: 	Reply ->
 1470: 	    Reply
 1471:     end.
 1472: 
 1473: ucheck_sorted1(_I, _J, _A, []) ->
 1474:     ok;
 1475: ucheck_sorted1(I, J, A, [B | Rest]) ->
 1476:     ok = ukeycompare(I, J, A, B),
 1477:     ucheck_sorted1(I, J, B, Rest).
 1478: 
 1479: ukeycompare(I, _J, A, B) when element(I, A) < element(I, B) ->
 1480:     ok;
 1481: ukeycompare(I, J, A, B) when A =/= B,
 1482: 			     element(I, A) == element(I, B), 
 1483: 			     element(J, A) =< element(J, B) ->
 1484:     ok.
 1485: 
 1486: 
 1487: 
 1488: %% Merge two lists using a fun.
 1489: funmerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1490: 
 1491:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
 1492:     Two = [1,2],
 1493:     Six = [1,2,3,4,5,6],
 1494:     F = fun(X, Y) -> X =< Y end,
 1495: 
 1496:     %% 2-way merge
 1497:     [] = lists:merge(F, [], []),
 1498:     Two = lists:merge(F, Two, []),
 1499:     Two = lists:merge(F, [], Two),
 1500:     Six = lists:merge(F, [1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
 1501:     Six = lists:merge(F, [2,4,6], [1,3,5]),
 1502:     Six = lists:merge(F, [1,2,3], [4,5,6]),
 1503:     Six = lists:merge(F, [4,5,6], [1,2,3]),
 1504:     Six = lists:merge(F, [1,2,5],[3,4,6]),
 1505:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:merge(F, [1,3,5,7], [2]),
 1506:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:merge(F, [1,3,5,7], [2,4]),
 1507:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:merge(F, [1,3,5,7], [2,4,6]),
 1508:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:merge(F, [2], [1,3,5,7]),
 1509:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:merge(F, [2,4], [1,3,5,7]),
 1510:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:merge(F, [2,4,6], [1,3,5,7]),
 1511: 
 1512:     F2 = fun(X,Y) -> element(1,X) =< element(1,Y) end,
 1513:     [{b,2},{c,11},{c,12},{c,21},{c,22},{e,5}] =
 1514: 	lists:merge(F2,[{c,11},{c,12},{e,5}], [{b,2},{c,21},{c,22}]),
 1515: 
 1516:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge(F, Singleton, [])),
 1517:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge(F, [], Singleton)),
 1518: 
 1519:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(F, a, b)),
 1520:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(F, a, [])),
 1521:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(F, [], b)),
 1522:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(F, a, [1, 2, 3])),
 1523:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(F, [1, 2, 3], b)),
 1524: 
 1525:     ok.
 1526: 
 1527: %% Reverse merge two lists using a fun.
 1528: rfunmerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1529: 
 1530:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
 1531:     Two = [2,1],
 1532:     Six = [6,5,4,3,2,1],
 1533:     F = fun(X, Y) -> X =< Y end,
 1534: 
 1535:     %% 2-way reversed merge
 1536:     [] = lists:rmerge(F, [], []),
 1537:     Two = lists:rmerge(F, Two, []),
 1538:     Two = lists:rmerge(F, [], Two),
 1539:     Six = lists:rmerge(F, [5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
 1540:     Six = lists:rmerge(F, [6,4,2], [5,3,1]),
 1541:     Six = lists:rmerge(F, [3,2,1], [6,5,4]),
 1542:     Six = lists:rmerge(F, [6,5,4], [3,2,1]),
 1543:     Six = lists:rmerge(F, [4,3,2],[6,5,1]),
 1544:     [7,6,5,3,1] = lists:rmerge(F, [7,5,3,1], [6]),
 1545:     [7,6,5,4,3,1] = lists:rmerge(F, [7,5,3,1], [6,4]),
 1546:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge(F, [7,5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
 1547:     [7,5,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge(F, [2], [7,5,3,1]),
 1548:     [7,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge(F, [4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
 1549:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge(F, [6,4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
 1550: 
 1551:     F2 = fun(X,Y) -> element(1,X) =< element(1,Y) end,
 1552:     L1 = [{c,11},{c,12},{e,5}],
 1553:     L2 = [{b,2},{c,21},{c,22}],
 1554:     true =
 1555: 	lists:merge(F2, L1, L2) == 
 1556: 	lists:reverse(lists:rmerge(F2,lists:reverse(L1), lists:reverse(L2))),
 1557: 
 1558:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge(F, Singleton, [])),
 1559:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge(F, [], Singleton)),
 1560: 
 1561:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(F, a, b)),
 1562:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(F, a, [])),
 1563:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(F, [], b)),
 1564:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(F, a, [1, 2, 3])),
 1565:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(F, [1, 2, 3], b)),
 1566: 
 1567:     ok.
 1568: 
 1569: 
 1570: funsort_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1571:     ok = funsort_check(1, [], []),
 1572:     ok = funsort_check(1, [{a,b}], [{a,b}]),
 1573:     ok = funsort_check(1, [{a,b},{a,b}], [{a,b},{a,b}]),
 1574:     ok = funsort_check(1, [{a,b},{b,c}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1575:     ok = funsort_check(1, [{b,c},{a,b}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1576:     ok = funsort_check(1,
 1577: 		       [{1,e},{3,f},{2,y},{0,z},{x,14}],
 1578: 		       [{0,z},{1,e},{2,y},{3,f},{x,14}]),
 1579:     F = funsort_fun(1),
 1580: 
 1581:     [{b,1},{c,1}] = lists:sort(F, [{c,1},{b,1}]),
 1582:     [{a,0},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4}] =
 1583: 	lists:sort(F, [{d,4},{c,3},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1584:     [{a,0},{b,1},{b,2},{c,1}] =
 1585: 	lists:sort(F, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1586:     [{a,0},{b,1},{b,2},{c,1},{d,4}] =
 1587: 	lists:sort(F, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,2},{a,0},{d,4}]),
 1588: 
 1589:     SFun = fun(L) -> fun(X) -> funsort_check(1, X, L) end end,
 1590:     L1 = [{1,a},{1,a},{2,b},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}],
 1591:     lists:foreach(SFun(L1), perms(L1)),
 1592: 
 1593:     ok.
 1594: 
 1595: %% sort/2 should be stable.
 1596: funsort_stable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1597:     ok = funsort_check(1, [{1,b},{1,c}], [{1,b},{1,c}]),
 1598:     ok = funsort_check(1, [{1,c},{1,b}], [{1,c},{1,b}]),
 1599:     ok = funsort_check(1,
 1600: 		       [{1,c},{1,b},{2,x},{3,p},{2,a}],
 1601: 		       [{1,c},{1,b},{2,x},{2,a},{3,p}]),
 1602:     ok.
 1603: 
 1604: %% sort/2 should exit when given bad arguments.
 1605: funsort_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1606:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:sort(1, [{1,b} , {1,c}])),
 1607:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:sort(fun(X,Y) -> X =< Y end,
 1608: 				    [{1,b} | {1,c}])),
 1609:     ok.
 1610: 
 1611: %% sort/2 on big randomized lists.
 1612: funsort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1613:     ok = funsort_check3(1, biglist(10)),
 1614:     ok = funsort_check3(1, biglist(100)),
 1615:     ok = funsort_check3(1, biglist(1000)),
 1616:     ok = funsort_check3(1, biglist(10000)),
 1617:     ok.
 1618: 
 1619: %% Do a keysort
 1620: funsort(I, L) ->
 1621:     lists:sort(funsort_fun(I), L).
 1622: 
 1623: funsort_check3(I, Input) ->
 1624:     check_sorted(I, 3, Input, funsort(I, Input)).
 1625: 
 1626: %%% Keysort a list, check that the returned list is what we expected,
 1627: %%% and that it is actually sorted.
 1628: funsort_check(I, Input, Expected) ->
 1629:     Expected = funsort(I, Input),
 1630:     check_sorted(I, Input, Expected).
 1631: 
 1632: 
 1633: %% Merge two lists while removing duplicates using a fun.
 1634: ufunmerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1635: 
 1636:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
 1637:     Two = [1,2],
 1638:     Six = [1,2,3,4,5,6],
 1639:     F = fun(X, Y) -> X =< Y end,
 1640: 
 1641:     %% 2-way unique merge
 1642:     [] = lists:umerge(F, [], []),
 1643:     Two = lists:umerge(F, Two, []),
 1644:     Two = lists:umerge(F, [], Two),
 1645:     Six = lists:umerge(F, [1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
 1646:     Six = lists:umerge(F, [2,4,6], [1,3,5]),
 1647:     Six = lists:umerge(F, [1,2,3], [4,5,6]),
 1648:     Six = lists:umerge(F, [4,5,6], [1,2,3]),
 1649:     Six = lists:umerge(F, [1,2,5],[3,4,6]),
 1650:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge(F, [1,3,5,7], [2]),
 1651:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge(F, [1,3,5,7], [2,4]),
 1652:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge(F, [1,3,5,7], [2,4,6]),
 1653:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge(F, [2], [1,3,5,7]),
 1654:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge(F, [2,4], [1,3,5,7]),
 1655:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge(F, [2,4,6], [1,3,5,7]),
 1656: 
 1657:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge(F, [1,2,3,5,7], [2]),
 1658:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge(F, [1,2,3,4,5,7], [2,4]),
 1659:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge(F, [1,3,5,6,7], [2,4,6]),
 1660:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge(F, [2], [1,2,3,5,7]),
 1661:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge(F, [2,4], [1,2,3,4,5,7]),
 1662:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge(F, [2,4,6], [1,2,3,4,5,6,7]),
 1663: 
 1664:     L1 = [{a,1},{a,3},{a,5},{a,7}],
 1665:     L2 = [{b,1},{b,3},{b,5},{b,7}],
 1666:     F2 = fun(X,Y) -> element(2,X) =< element(2,Y) end,
 1667:     L1 = lists:umerge(F2, L1, L2),
 1668:     [{b,2},{e,5},{c,11},{c,12},{c,21},{c,22}] =
 1669: 	lists:umerge(F2, [{e,5},{c,11},{c,12}], [{b,2},{c,21},{c,22}]),
 1670: 
 1671:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge(F, Singleton, [])),
 1672:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge(F, [], Singleton)),
 1673: 
 1674:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(F, a, b)),
 1675:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(F, a, [])),
 1676:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(F, [], b)),
 1677:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(F, a, [1, 2, 3])),
 1678:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(F, [1, 2, 3], b)),
 1679: 
 1680:     ok.
 1681: 
 1682: %% Reverse merge two lists while removing duplicates using a fun.
 1683: rufunmerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1684:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
 1685:     Two = [2,1],
 1686:     Six = [6,5,4,3,2,1],
 1687:     F = fun(X, Y) -> X =< Y end,
 1688: 
 1689:     %% 2-way reversed unique merge
 1690:     [] = lists:rumerge(F, [], []),
 1691:     Two = lists:rumerge(F, Two, []),
 1692:     Two = lists:rumerge(F, [], Two),
 1693:     Six = lists:rumerge(F, [5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
 1694:     Six = lists:rumerge(F, [6,4,2], [5,3,1]),
 1695:     Six = lists:rumerge(F, [3,2,1], [6,5,4]),
 1696:     Six = lists:rumerge(F, [6,5,4], [3,2,1]),
 1697:     Six = lists:rumerge(F, [4,3,2],[6,5,1]),
 1698:     [7,6,5,3,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [7,5,3,1], [6]),
 1699:     [7,6,5,4,3,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [7,5,3,1], [6,4]),
 1700:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [7,5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
 1701:     [7,5,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [2], [7,5,3,1]),
 1702:     [7,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
 1703:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [6,4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
 1704: 
 1705:     [7,6,5,3,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [7,6,5,3,1], [6]),
 1706:     [7,6,5,4,3,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [7,6,5,4,3,1], [6,4]),
 1707:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [7,6,5,4,3,2,1], [6,4,2]),
 1708:     [7,5,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [2], [7,5,3,2,1]),
 1709:     [7,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [4,2], [7,5,4,3,2,1]),
 1710:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge(F, [6,4,2], [7,6,5,4,3,2,1]),
 1711: 
 1712:     F2 = fun(X,Y) -> element(1,X) =< element(1,Y) end,
 1713:     L1 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a}],
 1714:     L2 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a}],
 1715:     true = lists:umerge(F2, L1, L2) ==
 1716: 	lists:reverse(lists:rumerge(F, lists:reverse(L2), lists:reverse(L1))),
 1717: 
 1718:     L3 = [{c,11},{c,12},{e,5}],
 1719:     L4 = [{b,2},{c,21},{c,22}],
 1720:     true =
 1721: 	lists:umerge(F2, L3, L4) == 
 1722: 	lists:reverse(lists:rumerge(F2,lists:reverse(L3), lists:reverse(L4))),
 1723: 
 1724:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge(F, Singleton, [])),
 1725:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge(F, [], Singleton)),
 1726: 
 1727:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(F, a, b)),
 1728:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(F, a, [])),
 1729:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(F, [], b)),
 1730:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(F, a, [1, 2, 3])),
 1731:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(F, [1, 2, 3], b)),
 1732: 
 1733:     ok.
 1734: 
 1735: ufunsort_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1736:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, [], []),
 1737:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, [{a,b}], [{a,b}]),
 1738:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, [{a,b},{a,b}], [{a,b}]),
 1739:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, [{a,b},{b,c}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1740:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, [{b,c},{a,b}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1741:     ok = ufunsort_check(1,
 1742: 			[{1,e},{3,f},{2,y},{0,z},{x,14}],
 1743: 			[{0,z},{1,e},{2,y},{3,f},{x,14}]),
 1744:     ok = ufunsort_check(1,
 1745: 			[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},
 1746: 			 {2,b},{1,a}],
 1747: 			[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]),
 1748:     ok = ufunsort_check(1,
 1749: 			[{1,a},{1,a},{1,b},{1,b},{1,a},{2,a}],
 1750: 			[{1,a},{2,a}]),
 1751: 
 1752:     F = funsort_fun(1),
 1753:     L1 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a}],
 1754:     L2 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a}],
 1755:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L1, L2),
 1756: 			lists:umerge(F, lists:usort(F, L1),
 1757: 				     lists:usort(F, L2))),
 1758:     L3 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a},{2,a}],
 1759:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L3, L2),
 1760: 			lists:umerge(F, lists:usort(F, L3),
 1761: 				     lists:usort(F, L2))),
 1762:     L4 = [{1,b},{1,a}],
 1763:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L1, L4),
 1764: 			lists:umerge(F, lists:usort(F, L1),
 1765: 				     lists:usort(F, L4))),
 1766:     L5 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a},{2,a}],
 1767:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L5, []),
 1768: 			lists:umerge(F, lists:usort(F, L5), [])),
 1769:     L6 = [{3,a}],
 1770:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L5, L6),
 1771: 			lists:umerge(F, lists:usort(F, L5),
 1772: 				     lists:usort(F, L6))),
 1773: 
 1774:     [{b,1},{c,1}] = lists:usort(F, [{c,1},{c,1},{b,1}]),
 1775:     [{a,0},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4}] =
 1776: 	lists:usort(F, [{d,4},{c,3},{b,2},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1777:     [{a,0},{b,1},{c,1}] =
 1778: 	lists:usort(F, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,1},{b,2},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1779:     [{a,0},{b,1},{c,1},{d,4}] =
 1780: 	lists:usort(F, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,2},{a,0},{a,0},{d,4},{d,4}]),
 1781: 
 1782:     SFun = fun(L) -> fun(X) -> ufunsort_check(1, X, L) end end,
 1783:     PL = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}],
 1784:     Ps = perms([{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1785:     lists:foreach(SFun(PL), Ps),
 1786: 
 1787:     ok.
 1788: 
 1789: %% usort/2 should be stable.
 1790: ufunsort_stable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1791:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, [{1,b},{1,c}], [{1,b}]),
 1792:     ok = ufunsort_check(1, [{1,c},{1,b}], [{1,c}]),
 1793:     ok = ufunsort_check(1,
 1794: 			[{1,c},{1,b},{2,x},{3,p},{2,a}],
 1795: 			[{1,c},{2,x},{3,p}]),
 1796: 
 1797:     ok = ufunsort_check_stability(bigfunlist(10)),
 1798:     ok = ufunsort_check_stability(bigfunlist(100)),
 1799:     ok = ufunsort_check_stability(bigfunlist(1000)),
 1800:     case erlang:system_info(modified_timing_level) of
 1801: 	undefined -> ok = ufunsort_check_stability(bigfunlist(10000));
 1802: 	_ -> ok
 1803:     end,
 1804:     ok.
 1805: 
 1806: %% usort/2 should exit when given bad arguments.
 1807: ufunsort_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1808:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:usort(1, [{1,b} , {1,c}])),
 1809:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:usort(fun(X,Y) -> X =< Y end,
 1810: 				     [{1,b} | {1,c}])),
 1811:     ok.
 1812: 
 1813: %% usort/2 on big randomized lists.
 1814: ufunsort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1815:     ok = ufunsort_check3(1, biglist(10)),
 1816:     ok = ufunsort_check3(1, biglist(100)),
 1817:     ok = ufunsort_check3(1, biglist(1000)),
 1818:     ok = ufunsort_check3(1, biglist(10000)),
 1819: 
 1820:     ok = gen_ufunsort_check(1, ubiglist(100)),
 1821:     ok = gen_ufunsort_check(1, ubiglist(1000)),
 1822:     ok = gen_ufunsort_check(1, ubiglist(10000)),
 1823:     ok.
 1824: 
 1825: %% Check that usort/2 is stable and correct relative sort/2.
 1826: gen_ufunsort_check(I, Input) ->
 1827:     U = ufunsort(I, Input),
 1828:     S = funsort(I, Input),
 1829:     case U == no_dups_keys(S, I) of
 1830: 	true ->
 1831: 	    ok;
 1832: 	false ->
 1833: 	    io:format("~w~n", [Input]),
 1834: 	    erlang:error(gen_ufunsort_check)
 1835:     end.
 1836: 
 1837: %% Used for checking that the first copy is kept.
 1838: ufunsort_check_stability(L) ->
 1839:     I = 1,
 1840:     U = ufunsort(I, L),
 1841:     S = no_dups(funsort(I, L)),
 1842:     check_stab(L, U, S, "usort/2", "sort/2").
 1843: 
 1844: ufunsort_check3(I, Input) ->
 1845:     ucheck_sorted(I, 3, Input, ufunsort(I, Input)).
 1846: 
 1847: %%% Keysort a list, check that the returned list is what we expected,
 1848: %%% and that it is actually sorted.
 1849: ufunsort_check(I, Input, Expected) ->
 1850:     Expected = ufunsort(I, Input),
 1851:     ucheck_sorted(I, Input, Expected).
 1852: 
 1853: %% Do a keysort
 1854: ufunsort(I, L) ->
 1855:     lists:usort(funsort_fun(I), L).
 1856: 
 1857: funsort_fun(I) ->
 1858:     fun(A, B) when tuple_size(A) >= I, tuple_size(B) >= I ->
 1859:             element(I, A) =< element(I, B)
 1860:     end.
 1861: 
 1862: check_stab(L, U, S, US, SS) ->
 1863:     UP = explicit_pid(U),
 1864:     SP = explicit_pid(S),
 1865:     case UP == SP of
 1866: 	true ->
 1867: 	    ok;
 1868: 	false ->
 1869: 	    io:format("In: ~w~n", [explicit_pid(L)]),
 1870: 	    io:format("~s: ~w~n", [US, UP]),
