 1871: 	    io:format("~s:  ~w~n", [SS, SP]),
 1872: 	    erlang:error(unstable)
 1873:     end.
 1874: 
 1875: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 1876: %%% Generate lists of given length, containing 3-tuples with
 1877: %%% random integer elements in the range 0..44 as elements 1 and 2.
 1878: %%% Element 3 in the tuple is the position of the tuple in the list.
 1879: 
 1880: biglist(N) ->
 1881:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 1882:     biglist(N, []).
 1883: 
 1884: biglist(0, L) ->
 1885:     L;
 1886: biglist(N, L) ->
 1887:     E = random_tuple(45, N),
 1888:     biglist(N-1, [E|L]).
 1889: 
 1890: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 1891: %%% Generate lists of given length, containing 2-tuples with
 1892: %%% random integer elements in the range 0..10 as element 1.
 1893: %%% Element 2 in the tuple is a random integer in the range 0..5.
 1894: %%% No sequence number.
 1895: 
 1896: ubiglist(N) ->
 1897:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 1898:     ubiglist(N, []).
 1899: 
 1900: ubiglist(0, L) ->
 1901:     L;
 1902: ubiglist(N, L) ->
 1903:     E = urandom_tuple(11, 6),
 1904:     ubiglist(N-1, [E|L]).
 1905: 
 1906: urandom_tuple(N, I) ->
 1907:     R1 = randint(N),
 1908:     R2 = randint(I),
 1909:     {R1, R2}.
 1910: 
 1911: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 1912: %%% Generate lists of given length, containing 2-tuples with random
 1913: %%% integer elements in the range 0..10 as elements 1. All tuples have
 1914: %%% the same function as element 2, but every function is created in a
 1915: %%% unique process. ==/2 will return 'true' for any pair of functions,
 1916: %%% but erlang:fun_info(Fun, pid) can be used for distinguishing
 1917: %%% functions created in different processes. The pid acts like a
 1918: %%% sequence number.
 1919: 
 1920: bigfunlist(N) ->
 1921:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 1922:     bigfunlist_1(N).
 1923: 
 1924: bigfunlist_1(N) when N < 30000 -> % Now (R8) max 32000 different pids.
 1925:     case catch bigfunlist(N, 0, []) of
 1926: 	{'EXIT', _} ->
 1927: 	    bigfunlist_1(N);
 1928: 	Reply ->
 1929: 	    Reply
 1930:     end.
 1931: 
 1932: bigfunlist(0, _P, L) ->
 1933:     lists:reverse(L);
 1934: bigfunlist(N, P, L) ->
 1935:     {E, NP} = random_funtuple(P, 11),
 1936:     bigfunlist(N-1, NP, [E | L]).
 1937: 
 1938: random_funtuple(P, N) ->
 1939:     R = randint(N),
 1940:     F = make_fun(),
 1941:     NP = fun_pid(F),
 1942:     true = NP > P,
 1943:     {{R, F}, NP}.
 1944: 
 1945: make_fun() ->
 1946:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, make_fun, [self()]),
 1947:     receive {Pid, Fun} -> Fun end.
 1948: 
 1949: make_fun(Pid) ->
 1950:     Pid ! {self(), fun (X) -> {X, Pid} end}.
 1951: 
 1952: fun_pid(Fun) ->
 1953:     erlang:fun_info(Fun, pid).
 1954: 
 1955: random_tuple(N, Seq) ->
 1956:     R1 = randint(N),
 1957:     R2 = randint(N),
 1958:     {R1, R2, Seq}.
 1959: 
 1960: randint(N) ->
 1961:     trunc(rand:uniform() * N).
 1962: 
 1963: %% The first "duplicate" is kept.
 1964: no_dups([]) ->
 1965:     [];
 1966: no_dups([H | T]) ->
 1967:     no_dups(H, T, []).
 1968: 
 1969: no_dups(H, [H1 | T], L) when H == H1 ->
 1970:     no_dups(H, T, L);
 1971: no_dups(H, [H1 | T], L) ->
 1972:     no_dups(H1, T, [H | L]);
 1973: no_dups(H, [], L) ->
 1974:     lists:reverse([H | L]).
 1975: 
 1976: %% The first "duplicate" is kept.
 1977: no_dups_keys([], _I) ->
 1978:     [];
 1979: no_dups_keys([H | T], I) ->
 1980:     no_dups_keys(H, T, [], I).
 1981: 
 1982: no_dups_keys(H, [H1 | T], L, I) when element(I, H) == element(I, H1) ->
 1983:     no_dups_keys(H, T, L, I);
 1984: no_dups_keys(H, [H1 | T], L, I) ->
 1985:     no_dups_keys(H1, T, [H | L], I);
 1986: no_dups_keys(H, [], L, _I) ->
 1987:     lists:reverse([H | L]).
 1988: 
 1989: perms([]) ->
 1990:     [[]];
 1991: perms(L) ->
 1992:     [[H|T] || H <- L, T <- perms(L--[H])].
 1993: 
 1994: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 1995: %%% Test the sort routines with randomly generated lists.
 1996: 
 1997: -record(state, {sort = 0, usort = 0, stable = 0}).
 1998: 
 1999: %% Run it interactively. 'stop' or 'info' recognized commands.
 2000: sort_loop() ->
 2001:     sort_loop(5000).
 2002: 
 2003: sort_loop(N) when is_integer(N), N > 0 ->
 2004:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, sloop, [N]),
 2005:     sort_loop_1(Pid).
 2006: 
 2007: sort_loop_1(Pid) ->
 2008:     case io:get_line('? ') of
 2009: 	eof ->
 2010: 	    ok;
 2011: 	"stop\n" ->
 2012: 	    Pid ! {self(), stop},
 2013: 	    receive {Pid, S} -> display_state(S) end;
 2014: 	"info\n" ->
 2015: 	    Pid ! {self(), info},
 2016: 	    receive {Pid, S} -> display_state(S) end,
 2017: 	    sort_loop_1(Pid);
 2018: 	_Other ->
 2019: 	    sort_loop_1(Pid)
 2020:     end.
 2021: 
 2022: sloop(N) ->
 2023:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 2024:     sloop(N, #state{}).
 2025: 
 2026: sloop(N, S) ->
 2027:     receive
 2028: 	{From, stop} ->
 2029: 	    From ! {self(), S};
 2030: 	{From, info} ->
 2031: 	    From ! {self(), S},
 2032: 	    sloop(N, S)
 2033:     after 0 ->
 2034: 	    Len = randint(N),
 2035: 	    NS = case randint(3) of
 2036: 		     0 ->
 2037: 			 BL = biglist(Len, []),
 2038: 			 ok = check(BL),
 2039: 			 ok = keysort_check3(1, BL),
 2040: 			 ok = funsort_check3(1, BL),
 2041: 			 S#state{sort = S#state.sort + 1};
 2042: 		     1 ->
 2043: 			 BL = ubiglist(Len, []),
 2044: 			 ok = ucheck(BL),
 2045: 			 ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, BL),
 2046: 			 ok = gen_ufunsort_check(1, BL),
 2047: 			 S#state{usort = S#state.usort + 1};
 2048: 		     2 ->
 2049: 			 BL = bigfunlist(Len),
 2050: 			 %% ok = check_stability(BL),
 2051: 			 ok = ucheck_stability(BL),
 2052: 			 ok = ukeysort_check_stability(BL),
 2053: 			 ok = ufunsort_check_stability(BL),
 2054: 			 S#state{stable = S#state.stable + 1}
 2055: 		 end,
 2056: 	    sloop(N, NS)
 2057:     end.
 2058: 
 2059: display_state(S) ->    
 2060:     io:format("sort:   ~p~n", [S#state.sort]),
 2061:     io:format("usort:  ~p~n", [S#state.usort]),
 2062:     io:format("stable: ~p~n", [S#state.stable]).
 2063: 
 2064: %% This version of sort/1 is really stable; the order of equal
 2065: %% elements is kept. It is used for checking the current
 2066: %% implementation of usort/1 etc.
 2067: 
 2068: lsort([X, Y | L] = L0) when X =< Y ->
 2069:     case L of
 2070: 	[] -> 
 2071: 	    L0;
 2072: 	[Z] when Y =< Z ->
 2073: 	    L0;
 2074: 	[Z] when X =< Z ->
 2075: 	    [X, Z, Y];
 2076: 	[Z] ->
 2077: 	    [Z, X, Y];
 2078: 	_ ->
 2079: 	    split_1(X, Y, L, [], [])
 2080:     end;
 2081: lsort([X, Y | L]) ->
 2082:     case L of
 2083: 	[] ->
 2084: 	    [Y, X];
 2085: 	[Z] when X =< Z ->
 2086: 	    [Y, X | L];
 2087: 	[Z] when Y =< Z ->
 2088: 	    [Y, Z, X];
 2089: 	[Z] ->
 2090: 	    [Z, Y, X];
 2091: 	_ ->
 2092: 	    split_2(X, Y, L, [], [])
 2093:     end;
 2094: lsort([_] = L) ->
 2095:     L;
 2096: lsort([] = L) ->
 2097:     L.
 2098: 
 2099: split_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs) when Z >= Y ->
 2100:     split_1(Y, Z, L, [X | R], Rs);
 2101: split_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs) when Z >= X ->
 2102:     split_1(Z, Y, L, [X | R], Rs);
 2103: split_1(X, Y, [Z | L], [], Rs) ->
 2104:     split_1(X, Y, L, [Z], Rs);
 2105: split_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs) ->
 2106:     split_1_1(X, Y, L, R, Rs, Z);
 2107: split_1(X, Y, [], R, Rs) ->
 2108:     rmergel([[Y, X | R] | Rs], [], asc).
 2109: 
 2110: split_1_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs, S) when Z >= Y ->
 2111:     split_1_1(Y, Z, L, [X | R], Rs, S);
 2112: split_1_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs, S) when Z >= X ->
 2113:     split_1_1(Z, Y, L, [X | R], Rs, S);
 2114: split_1_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs, S) when S =< Z ->
 2115:     split_1(S, Z, L, [], [[Y, X | R] | Rs]);
 2116: split_1_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs, S) ->
 2117:     split_1(Z, S, L, [], [[Y, X | R] | Rs]);
 2118: split_1_1(X, Y, [], R, Rs, S) ->
 2119:     rmergel([[S], [Y, X | R] | Rs], [], asc).
 2120: 
 2121: split_2(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs) when Z < Y ->
 2122:     split_2(Y, Z, L, [X | R], Rs);
 2123: split_2(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs) when Z < X ->
 2124:     split_2(Z, Y, L, [X | R], Rs);
 2125: split_2(X, Y, [Z | L], [], Rs) ->
 2126:     split_2(X, Y, L, [Z], Rs);
 2127: split_2(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs) ->
 2128:     split_2_1(X, Y, L, R, Rs, Z);
 2129: split_2(X, Y, [], R, Rs) ->
 2130:     mergel([[Y, X | R] | Rs], [], desc).
 2131: 
 2132: split_2_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs, S) when Z < Y ->
 2133:     split_2_1(Y, Z, L, [X | R], Rs, S);
 2134: split_2_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs, S) when Z < X ->
 2135:     split_2_1(Z, Y, L, [X | R], Rs, S);
 2136: split_2_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs, S) when S > Z ->
 2137:     split_2(S, Z, L, [], [[Y, X | R] | Rs]);
 2138: split_2_1(X, Y, [Z | L], R, Rs, S) ->
 2139:     split_2(Z, S, L, [], [[Y, X | R] | Rs]);
 2140: split_2_1(X, Y, [], R, Rs, S) ->
 2141:     mergel([[S], [Y, X | R] | Rs], [], desc).
 2142: 
 2143: mergel([[] | L], Acc, O) ->
 2144:     mergel(L, Acc, O);
 2145: mergel([T1, [H2 | T2] | L], Acc, asc) ->
 2146:     mergel(L, [merge2_1(T1, H2, T2, []) | Acc], asc);
 2147: mergel([[H2 | T2], T1 | L], Acc, desc) ->
 2148:     mergel(L, [merge2_1(T1, H2, T2, []) | Acc], desc);
 2149: mergel([L], [], _O) ->
 2150:     L;
 2151: mergel([L], Acc, O) ->
 2152:     rmergel([lists:reverse(L, []) | Acc], [], O);
 2153: mergel([], [], _O) ->
 2154:     [];
 2155: mergel([], Acc, O) ->
 2156:     rmergel(Acc, [], O);
 2157: mergel([A, [] | L], Acc, O) ->
 2158:     mergel([A | L], Acc, O);
 2159: mergel([A, B, [] | L], Acc, O) ->
 2160:     mergel([A, B | L], Acc, O).
 2161: 
 2162: rmergel([[H2 | T2], T1 | L], Acc, asc) ->
 2163:     rmergel(L, [rmerge2_1(T1, H2, T2, []) | Acc], asc);
 2164: rmergel([T1, [H2 | T2] | L], Acc, desc) ->
 2165:     rmergel(L, [rmerge2_1(T1, H2, T2, []) | Acc], desc);
 2166: rmergel([L], Acc, O) ->
 2167:     mergel([lists:reverse(L, []) | Acc], [], O);
 2168: rmergel([], Acc, O) ->
 2169:     mergel(Acc, [], O).
 2170: 
 2171: merge2_1([H1 | T1], H2, T2, M) when H1 =< H2 ->
 2172:     merge2_1(T1, H2, T2, [H1 | M]);
 2173: merge2_1([H1 | T1], H2, T2, M) ->
 2174:     merge2_2(T1, H1, T2, [H2 | M]);
 2175: merge2_1([], H2, T2, M) ->
 2176:     lists:reverse(T2, [H2 | M]).
 2177: 
 2178: merge2_2(T1, H1, [H2 | T2], M) when H1 =< H2 ->
 2179:     merge2_1(T1, H2, T2, [H1 | M]);
 2180: merge2_2(T1, H1, [H2 | T2], M) ->
 2181:     merge2_2(T1, H1, T2, [H2 | M]);
 2182: merge2_2(T1, H1, [], M) ->
 2183:     lists:reverse(T1, [H1 | M]).
 2184: 
 2185: rmerge2_1([H1 | T1], H2, T2, M) when H1 =< H2 ->
 2186:     rmerge2_2(T1, H1, T2, [H2 | M]);
 2187: rmerge2_1([H1 | T1], H2, T2, M) ->
 2188:     rmerge2_1(T1, H2, T2, [H1 | M]);
 2189: rmerge2_1([], H2, T2, M) ->
 2190:     lists:reverse(T2, [H2 | M]).
 2191: 
 2192: rmerge2_2(T1, H1, [H2 | T2], M) when H1 =< H2 ->
 2193:     rmerge2_2(T1, H1, T2, [H2 | M]);
 2194: rmerge2_2(T1, H1, [H2 | T2], M) ->
 2195:     rmerge2_1(T1, H2, T2, [H1 | M]);
 2196: rmerge2_2(T1, H1, [], M) ->
 2197:     lists:reverse(T1, [H1 | M]).
 2198: 
 2199: 
 2200: 
 2201: %% This version of keysort/2 is really stable; the order of equal
 2202: %% elements is kept. It is used for checking the current
 2203: %% implementation of ukeysort/2 etc.
 2204: 
 2205: lkeysort(Index, L) when is_integer(Index), Index > 0 ->
 2206:     case L of
 2207: 	[] -> L;
 2208: 	[_] -> L;
 2209: 	[X, Y | T] ->
 2210: 	    EX = element(Index, X),
 2211: 	    EY = element(Index, Y),
 2212: 	    if
 2213: 		EX =< EY ->
 2214: 		    keysplit_1(Index, X, EX, Y, EY, T, [], []);
 2215: 		true ->
 2216: 		    keysplit_2(Index, Y, EY, T, [X])
 2217: 	    end
 2218:     end.
 2219: 
 2220: keysplit_1(I, X, EX, Y, EY, [Z | L], R, Rs) ->
 2221:     EZ = element(I, Z),
 2222:     if 
 2223: 	EY =< EZ ->
 2224: 	    keysplit_1(I, Y, EY, Z, EZ, L, [X | R], Rs);
 2225: 	EX =< EZ ->
 2226: 	    keysplit_1(I, Z, EZ, Y, EY, L, [X | R], Rs);
 2227: 	true, R == [] ->
 2228: 	    keysplit_1(I, X, EX, Y, EY, L, [Z], Rs);
 2229: 	true ->
 2230: 	    keysplit_1_1(I, X, EX, Y, EY, L, R, Rs, Z, EZ)
 2231:     end;
 2232: keysplit_1(I, X, _EX, Y, _EY, [], R, Rs) ->
 2233:     rkeymergel(I, [[Y, X | R] | Rs], []).
 2234: 
 2235: %% One out-of-order element, S.
 2236: keysplit_1_1(I, X, EX, Y, EY, [Z | L], R, Rs, S, ES) ->
 2237:     EZ = element(I, Z),
 2238:     if
 2239: 	EY =< EZ ->
 2240: 	    keysplit_1_1(I, Y, EY, Z, EZ, L, [X | R], Rs, S, ES);
 2241: 	EX =< EZ ->
 2242: 	    keysplit_1_1(I, Z, EZ, Y, EY, L, [X | R], Rs, S, ES);
 2243: 	ES =< EZ ->
 2244: 	    keysplit_1(I, S, ES, Z, EZ, L, [], [[Y, X | R] | Rs]);
 2245: 	true ->
 2246: 	    keysplit_1(I, Z, EZ, S, ES, L, [], [[Y, X | R] | Rs])
 2247:     end;
 2248: keysplit_1_1(I, X, _EX, Y, _EY, [], R, Rs, S, _ES) ->
 2249:     rkeymergel(I, [[S], [Y, X | R] | Rs], []).
 2250: 
 2251: %% Descending.
 2252: keysplit_2(I, Y, EY, [Z | L], R) ->
 2253:     EZ = element(I, Z),
 2254:     if
 2255: 	EY =< EZ ->
 2256:             keysplit_1(I, Y, EY, Z, EZ, L, [], [lists:reverse(R, [])]);
 2257:         true ->
 2258:             keysplit_2(I, Z, EZ, L, [Y | R])
 2259:     end;
 2260: keysplit_2(_I, Y, _EY, [], R) ->
 2261:     [Y | R].
 2262: 
 2263: keymergel(I, [T1, [H2 | T2] | L], Acc) ->
 2264:     keymergel(I, L, [keymerge2_1(I, T1, element(I, H2), H2, T2, []) | Acc]);
 2265: keymergel(_I, [L], []) ->
 2266:     L;
 2267: keymergel(I, [L], Acc) ->
 2268:     rkeymergel(I, [lists:reverse(L, []) | Acc], []);
 2269: keymergel(I, [], Acc) ->
 2270:     rkeymergel(I, Acc, []).
 2271: 
 2272: rkeymergel(I, [[H2 | T2], T1 | L], Acc) ->
 2273:     rkeymergel(I, L, [rkeymerge2_1(I, T1, element(I, H2), H2, T2, []) | Acc]);
 2274: rkeymergel(I, [L], Acc) ->
 2275:     keymergel(I, [lists:reverse(L, []) | Acc], []);
 2276: rkeymergel(I, [], Acc) ->
 2277:     keymergel(I, Acc, []).
 2278: 
 2279: keymerge2_1(I, [H1 | T1], E2, H2, T2, M) ->
 2280:     E1 = element(I, H1),
 2281:     if 
 2282: 	E1 =< E2 ->
 2283: 	    keymerge2_1(I, T1, E2, H2, T2, [H1 | M]);
 2284: 	true ->
 2285: 	    keymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, H1, T2, [H2 | M])
 2286:     end;
 2287: keymerge2_1(_I, [], _E2, H2, T2, M) ->
 2288:     lists:reverse(T2, [H2 | M]).
 2289: 
 2290: keymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, H1, [H2 | T2], M) ->
 2291:     E2 = element(I, H2),
 2292:     if
 2293: 	E1 =< E2 ->
 2294: 	    keymerge2_1(I, T1, E2, H2, T2, [H1 | M]);
 2295: 	true ->
 2296: 	    keymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, H1, T2, [H2 | M])
 2297:     end;
 2298: keymerge2_2(_I, T1, _E1, H1, [], M) ->
 2299:     lists:reverse(T1, [H1 | M]).
 2300: 
 2301: rkeymerge2_1(I, [H1 | T1], E2, H2, T2, M) ->
 2302:     E1 = element(I, H1),
 2303:     if
 2304: 	E1 =< E2 ->
 2305: 	    rkeymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, T2, [H2 | M], H1);
 2306: 	true ->
 2307: 	    rkeymerge2_1(I, T1, E2, H2, T2, [H1 | M])
 2308:     end;
 2309: rkeymerge2_1(_I, [], _E2, H2, T2, M) ->
 2310:     lists:reverse(T2, [H2 | M]).
 2311: 
 2312: rkeymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, [H2 | T2], M, H1) ->
 2313:     E2 = element(I, H2),
 2314:     if
 2315: 	E1 =< E2 ->
 2316: 	    rkeymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, T2, [H2 | M], H1);
 2317: 	true ->
 2318: 	    rkeymerge2_1(I, T1, E2, H2, T2, [H1 | M])
 2319:     end;
 2320: rkeymerge2_2(_I, T1, _E1, [], M, H1) ->
 2321:     lists:reverse(T1, [H1 | M]).
 2322: 
 2323: 
 2324: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 2325: 
 2326: 
 2327: %% Test for infinite loop (OTP-2404).
 2328: seq_loop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2329:     _ = (catch lists:seq(1, 5, -1)),
 2330:     ok.
 2331: 
 2332: %% Non-error cases for seq/2.
 2333: seq_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2334:     [1,2,3] = lists:seq(1,3),
 2335:     [1] = lists:seq(1,1),
 2336:     Big = 748274827583793785928592859,
 2337:     Big1 = Big+1,
 2338:     Big2 = Big+2,
 2339:     [Big, Big1, Big2] = lists:seq(Big, Big+2),
 2340:     ok.
 2341: 
 2342: %% Error cases for seq/2.
 2343: seq_2_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2344:     seq_error([4, 2]),
 2345:     seq_error([1, a]),
 2346:     seq_error([1.0, 2.0]),
 2347:     ok.
 2348: 
 2349: seq_error(Args) ->
 2350:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch apply(lists, seq, Args)).
 2351: 
 2352: %% Non-error cases for seq/3.
 2353: seq_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2354:     [1,2,3] = lists:seq(1,3,1),
 2355:     [1] = lists:seq(1,1,1),
 2356:     Big = 748274827583793785928592859,
 2357:     Big1 = Big+1,
 2358:     Big2 = Big+2,
 2359:     [Big, Big1, Big2] = lists:seq(Big, Big+2,1),
 2360: 
 2361:     [3,2,1] = lists:seq(3,1,-1),
 2362:     [1] = lists:seq(1,1,-1),
 2363: 
 2364:     [3,1] = lists:seq(3,1,-2),
 2365:     [1] = lists:seq(1, 10, 10),
 2366:     [1, 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, 19] = lists:seq(1, 19, 3),
 2367:     [1, 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, 19] = lists:seq(1, 20, 3),
 2368:     [1, 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, 19] = lists:seq(1, 21, 3),
 2369: 
 2370:     [1] = lists:seq(1, 1, 0),		%OTP-2613
 2371:     ok.
 2372: 
 2373: %% Error cases for seq/3.
 2374: seq_3_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2375:     seq_error([4, 2, 1]),
 2376:     seq_error([3, 5, -1]),
 2377:     seq_error([1, a, 1]),
 2378:     seq_error([1.0, 2.0, 1]),
 2379: 
 2380:     seq_error([1, 3, 1.0]),
 2381:     seq_error([1, 3, a]),
 2382:     seq_error([1, 3, 0]),
 2383: 
 2384:     seq_error([a, a, 0]),
 2385:     ok.
 2386: 
 2387: %% OTP-7230. seq/1,2 returns the empty list.
 2388: otp_7230(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2389:     From = -10,
 2390:     To = 10,
 2391:     StepFrom = -10,
 2392:     StepTo = 10,
 2393: 
 2394:     L = lists:seq(From, To),
 2395:     SL = lists:seq(StepFrom, StepTo),
 2396:     [] =
 2397: 	[{F, T, S} ||
 2398: 	    F <- L, T <- L, S <- SL,
 2399: 	    not check_seq(F, T, S, catch lists:seq(F, T, S))
 2400: 		orelse
 2401: 		S =:= 1 andalso not check_seq(F, T, S, catch lists:seq(F, T))
 2402:         ].
 2403: 
 2404: check_seq(From, To, 0, R) ->
 2405:     From =:= To andalso R =:= [From]
 2406: 	orelse
 2407: 	From =/= To andalso is_tuple(R) andalso element(1, R) =:= 'EXIT';
 2408: check_seq(From, To, Step, []) when Step =/= 0 ->
 2409:     0 =:= property(From, To, Step)
 2410: 	andalso
 2411: 	  (
 2412: 	  Step > 0 andalso To < From andalso From-To =< Step
 2413: 	  orelse
 2414: 	  Step < 0 andalso To > From andalso To-From =< -Step
 2415: 	 );
 2416: check_seq(From, To, Step, R) when R =/= [], To < From, Step > 0 ->
 2417:     is_tuple(R) andalso element(1, R) =:= 'EXIT';
 2418: check_seq(From, To, Step, R) when R =/= [], To > From, Step < 0 ->
 2419:     is_tuple(R) andalso element(1, R) =:= 'EXIT';
 2420: check_seq(From, To, Step, L) when is_list(L), L =/= [], Step =/= 0 ->
 2421:     First = hd(L),
 2422:     Last = lists:last(L),
 2423:     Min = lists:min(L),
 2424:     Max = lists:max(L),
 2425: 
 2426:     [] =:= [E || E <- L, not is_integer(E)]
 2427: 	andalso
 2428:     %% The difference between two consecutive elements is Step:
 2429: 	begin
 2430: 	    LS = [First-Step]++L,
 2431: 	    LR = L++[Last+Step],
 2432: 	    [Step] =:= lists:usort([B-A || {A,B} <- lists:zip(LS, LR)])
 2433: 	end
 2434: 	andalso
 2435:     %% The first element of L is From:
 2436: 	From =:= First
 2437: 	andalso
 2438:     %% No element outside the given interval:
 2439: 	Min >= lists:min([From, To])
 2440: 	andalso
 2441: 	Max =< lists:max([From, To])
 2442: 	andalso
 2443:     %% All elements are present:
 2444: 	abs(To-Last) < abs(Step)
 2445: 	andalso
 2446: 	length(L) =:= property(From, To, Step);
 2447: check_seq(_From, _To, _Step, _R) ->
 2448:     false.
 2449: 
 2450: property(From, To, Step) ->
 2451:     ((To-From+Step) div Step).
 2452: 
 2453: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 2454: 
 2455: 
 2456: -define(sublist_error2(X,Y), {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:sublist(X,Y))).
 2457: -define(sublist_error3(X,Y,Z), {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:sublist(X,Y,Z))).
 2458: 
 2459: sublist_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2460:     [] = lists:sublist([], 0),
 2461:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1),
 2462:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 0),
 2463:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1),
 2464:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 2),
 2465:     [a] = lists:sublist([a|b], 1),
 2466: 
 2467:     [a,b] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 2),
 2468: 
 2469:     ok.
 2470: 
 2471: %% sublist/2 error cases.
 2472: sublist_2_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2473:     ?sublist_error2([], -1),
 2474:     ?sublist_error2(a, -1),
 2475:     ?sublist_error2(a, 0),
 2476:     ?sublist_error2([a|b], 2),
 2477:     ?sublist_error2([a], x),
 2478:     ?sublist_error2([a], 1.5),
 2479:     ?sublist_error2([], x),
 2480:     ?sublist_error2([], 1.5),
 2481:     ok.
 2482: 
 2483: sublist_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2484:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1, 0),
 2485:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1, 1),
 2486:     [] = lists:sublist([], 2, 0),
 2487:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 0),
 2488:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 1),
 2489:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 2),
 2490:     [a] = lists:sublist([a|b], 1, 1),
 2491: 
 2492:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1, 0),
 2493:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1, 1),
 2494:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 0),
 2495:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 1),
 2496:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 2),
 2497:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 2, 1),
 2498:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 2, 2),
 2499:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 2, 79),
 2500:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 3, 1),
 2501:     [] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 1, 0),
 2502:     [] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 2, 0),
 2503:     [a] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 1, 1),
 2504:     [b] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 2, 1),
 2505:     [a,b] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 1, 2),
 2506: 
 2507:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 2, 0),
 2508: 
 2509:     ok.
 2510: 
 2511: %% sublist/3 error cases
 2512: sublist_3_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2513:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, -1),
 2514:     ?sublist_error3(a, 1, -1),
 2515:     ?sublist_error3(a, 1, 0),
 2516:     ?sublist_error3([a|b], 1, 2),
 2517:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, x),
 2518:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, 1.5),
 2519:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, x),
 2520:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, 1.5),
 2521: 
 2522:     ?sublist_error3([], -1, 0),
 2523:     ?sublist_error3(a, x, -1),
 2524:     ?sublist_error3([a,b], 0.5, 1),
 2525:     ?sublist_error3([a,b], 1.5, 1),
 2526:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, x),
 2527:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, 1.5),
 2528:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, x),
 2529:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, 1.5),
 2530: 
 2531:     ?sublist_error3([a], 0, -1),
 2532:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, -1),
 2533:     ?sublist_error3([a], 2, -1),
 2534:     ?sublist_error3([a], 0, 0),
 2535:     ?sublist_error3([a], 0, 1),
 2536: 
 2537:     ?sublist_error3([a,b|c], 2, 2),
 2538:     ?sublist_error3([a,b|c], 3, 0),
 2539:     ?sublist_error3([a,b|c], 3, 1),
 2540:     ok.
 2541:

 2544: 
 2545: -define(flatten_error1(X), {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:flatten(X))).
 2546: -define(flatten_error2(X,Y), {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:flatten(X,Y))).
 2547: 
 2548: %% Test lists:flatten/1,2 and lists:flatlength/1.
 2549: flatten_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2550:     [] = lists_flatten([]),
 2551:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([1,2]),
 2552:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([1,[2]]),
 2553:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([[1],2]),
 2554:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([[1],[2]]),
 2555:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([[1,2]]),
 2556:     [a,b,c,d] = lists_flatten([[a],[b,c,[d]]]),
 2557: 
 2558:     ok.
 2559: 
 2560: lists_flatten(List) ->
 2561:     Flat = lists:flatten(List),
 2562:     Flat = lists:flatten(List, []),
 2563:     Len = lists:flatlength(List),
 2564:     Len = length(Flat),
 2565:     Flat.
 2566: 
 2567: %% flatten/1 error cases
 2568: flatten_1_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2569:     ?flatten_error1(a),
 2570:     ?flatten_error1([a|b]),
 2571:     ?flatten_error1([[a],[b|c],[d]]),
 2572:     ok.
 2573: 
 2574: %%% [arndt] What if second arg isn't a proper list? This issue isn't
 2575: %%% clear-cut. Right now, I think that any term should be allowed.
 2576: %%% But I also wish this function didn't exist at all.
 2577: 
 2578: %% Test lists:flatten/2.
 2579: flatten_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2580:     [] = lists:flatten([], []),
 2581:     [a] = lists:flatten([a], []),
 2582:     [a,b,c,[no,flatten]] = lists:flatten([[a,[b,c]]], [[no,flatten]]),
 2583:     ok.
 2584: 
 2585: %% flatten/2 error cases.
 2586: flatten_2_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2587:     ok.
 2588: 
 2589: %% Test lists:zip/2, lists:unzip/1.
 2590: zip_unzip(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2591:     [] = lists:zip([], []),
 2592:     [{a,b}] = lists:zip([a], [b]),
 2593:     [{42.0,{kalle,nisse}},{a,b}] = lists:zip([42.0,a], [{kalle,nisse},b]),
 2594: 
 2595:     %% Longer lists.
 2596:     SeqA = lists:seq(45, 200),
 2597:     SeqB = [A*A || A <- SeqA],
 2598:     AB = lists:zip(SeqA, SeqB),
 2599:     SeqA = [A || {A,_} <- AB],
 2600:     SeqB = [B || {_,B} <- AB],
 2601:     {SeqA,SeqB} = lists:unzip(AB),
 2602: 
 2603:     %% Some more unzip/1.
 2604:     {[],[]} = lists:unzip([]),
 2605:     {[a],[b]} = lists:unzip([{a,b}]),
 2606:     {[a,c],[b,d]} = lists:unzip([{a,b},{c,d}]),
 2607: 
 2608:     %% Error cases.
 2609:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip([], [b])),
 2610:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [])),
 2611:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [b,c])),
 2612:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [b,c])),
 2613:     ok.
 2614: 
 2615: zip_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2616:     [] = lists:zip([], [], fail),
 2617:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [], fail)),
 2618:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip([], [c], fail)),
 2619: 
 2620:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a], [c], fail),
 2621:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip([a, b], [c], fail)),
 2622:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [c, d], fail)),
 2623: 
 2624:     ok.
 2625: 
 2626: zip_trim(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2627:     [] = lists:zip([], [], trim),
 2628:     [] = lists:zip([a], [], trim),
 2629:     [] = lists:zip([], [c], trim),
 2630: 
 2631:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a], [c], trim),
 2632:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a, b], [c], trim),
 2633:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a], [c, d], trim),
 2634: 
 2635:     ok.
 2636: 
 2637: zip_pad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2638:     How = {pad, {x, y}},
 2639: 
 2640:     [] = lists:zip([], [], How),
 2641:     [{a, y}] = lists:zip([a], [], How),
 2642:     [{x, c}] = lists:zip([], [c], How),
 2643: 
 2644:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a], [c], How),
 2645:     [{a, c}, {b, y}] = lists:zip([a, b], [c], How),
 2646:     [{a, c}, {x, d}] = lists:zip([a], [c, d], How),
 2647: 
 2648:     ok.
 2649: 
 2650: %% Test lists:zip3/3, lists:unzip3/1.
 2651: zip_unzip3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2652:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], []),
 2653:     [{a,b,c}] = lists:zip3([a], [b], [c]),
 2654: 
 2655:     %% Longer lists.
 2656:     SeqA = lists:seq(45, 200),
 2657:     SeqB = [2*A || A <- SeqA],
 2658:     SeqC = [A*A || A <- SeqA],
 2659:     ABC = lists:zip3(SeqA, SeqB, SeqC),
 2660:     SeqA = [A || {A,_,_} <- ABC],
 2661:     SeqB = [B || {_,B,_} <- ABC],
 2662:     SeqC = [C || {_,_,C} <- ABC],
 2663:     {SeqA,SeqB,SeqC} = lists:unzip3(ABC),
 2664: 
 2665:     %% Some more unzip3/1.
 2666:     {[],[],[]} = lists:unzip3([]),
 2667:     {[a],[b],[c]} = lists:unzip3([{a,b,c}]),
 2668: 
 2669:     %% Error cases.
 2670:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [], [c])),
 2671:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [b], [])),
 2672:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [], [])),
 2673: 
 2674:     ok.
 2675: 
 2676: zip3_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2677:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], [], fail),
 2678:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [], [], fail)),
 2679:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [c], [], fail)),
 2680:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [c], [], fail)),
 2681:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [], [e], fail)),
 2682:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [], [e], fail)),
 2683:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [c], [e], fail)),
 2684: 
 2685:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e], fail),
 2686:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e], fail)),
 2687:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e], fail)),
 2688:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a, b], [c, d], [e], fail)),
 2689:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [c], [e, f], fail)),
 2690:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e, f], fail)),
 2691:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e, f], fail)),
 2692: 
 2693:     ok.
 2694: 
 2695: zip3_trim(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2696:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], [], trim),
 2697:     [] = lists:zip3([a], [], [], trim),
 2698:     [] = lists:zip3([], [c], [], trim),
 2699:     [] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [], trim),
 2700:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], [e], trim),
 2701:     [] = lists:zip3([a], [], [e], trim),
 2702:     [] = lists:zip3([], [c], [e], trim),
 2703: 
 2704:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e], trim),
 2705:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e], trim),
 2706:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e], trim),
 2707:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c, d], [e], trim),
 2708:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e, f], trim),
 2709:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e, f], trim),
 2710:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e, f], trim),
 2711:

 2714: zip3_pad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2715:     How = {pad, {x, y, z}},
 2716: 
 2717:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], [], How),
 2718:     [{a, y, z}] = lists:zip3([a], [], [], How),
 2719:     [{x, c, z}] = lists:zip3([], [c], [], How),
 2720:     [{a, c, z}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [], How),
 2721:     [{x, y, e}] = lists:zip3([], [], [e], How),
 2722:     [{a, y, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [], [e], How),
 2723:     [{x, c, e}] = lists:zip3([], [c], [e], How),
 2724: 
 2725:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e], How),
 2726:     [{a, c, e}, {b, y, z}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e], How),
 2727:     [{a, c, e}, {x, d, z}] = lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e], How),
 2728:     [{a, c, e}, {b, d, z}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c, d], [e], How),
 2729:     [{a, c, e}, {x, y, f}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e, f], How),
 2730:     [{a, c, e}, {b, y, f}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e, f], How),
 2731:     [{a, c, e}, {x, d, f}] = lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e, f], How),
 2732: 
 2733:     ok.
 2734: 
 2735: %% Test lists:zipwith/3.
 2736: zipwith(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2737:     Zip = fun(A, B) -> [A|B] end,
 2738: 
 2739:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], []),
 2740:     [[a|b]] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [a], [b]),
 2741: 
 2742:     %% Longer lists.
 2743:     SeqA = lists:seq(77, 300),
 2744:     SeqB = [A*A || A <- SeqA],
 2745:     AB = lists:zipwith(Zip, SeqA, SeqB),
 2746:     SeqA = [A || [A|_] <- AB],
 2747:     SeqB = [B || [_|B] <- AB],
 2748: 
 2749:     %% Error cases.
 2750:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(badfun, [], [])),
 2751:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [b])),
 2752:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [a], [])),
 2753:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [a], [b,c])),
 2754:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [a], [b,c])),
 2755:     ok.
 2756: 
 2757: zipwith_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2758:     Zip = fun(A, B) -> A * B end,
 2759: 
 2760:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [], fail),
 2761:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [], fail)),
 2762:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [5], fail)),
 2763: 
 2764:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5], fail),
 2765:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [2, 3], [5], fail)),
 2766:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5, 7], fail)),
 2767: 
 2768:     ok.
 2769: 
 2770: zipwith_trim(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2771:     Zip = fun(A, B) -> A * B end,
 2772: 
 2773:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [], trim),
 2774:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [], trim),
 2775:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [5], trim),
 2776: 
 2777:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5], trim),
 2778:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2, 3], [5], trim),
 2779:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5, 7], trim),
 2780: 
 2781:     ok.
 2782: 
 2783: zipwith_pad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2784:     How = {pad, {17, 19}},
 2785: 
 2786:     Zip = fun(A, B) -> A * B end,
 2787: 
 2788:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [], How),
 2789:     [ 2 * 19] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [], How),
 2790:     [17 *  5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [5], How),
 2791: 
 2792:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5], How),
 2793:     [2 * 5,  3 * 19] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2, 3], [5], How),
 2794:     [2 * 5, 17 *  7] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5, 7], How),
 2795: 
 2796:     ok.
 2797: 
 2798: %% Test lists:zipwith3/4.
 2799: zipwith3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2800:     Zip = fun(A, B, C) -> [A,B,C] end,
 2801: 
 2802:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], []),
 2803:     [[a,b,c]] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [a], [b], [c]),
 2804: 
 2805:     %% Longer lists.
 2806:     SeqA = lists:seq(45, 200),
 2807:     SeqB = [2*A || A <- SeqA],
 2808:     SeqC = [A*A || A <- SeqA],
 2809:     ABC = lists:zipwith3(Zip, SeqA, SeqB, SeqC),
 2810:     SeqA = [A || [A,_,_] <- ABC],
 2811:     SeqB = [B || [_,B,_] <- ABC],
 2812:     SeqC = [C || [_,_,C] <- ABC],
 2813: 
 2814:     %% Error cases.
 2815:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(badfun, [], [], [])),
 2816:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [c])),
 2817:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [b], [])),
 2818:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [a], [], [])),
 2819: 
 2820:     ok.
 2821: 
 2822: zipwith3_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2823:     Zip = fun(A, B, C) -> A * B * C end,
 2824: 
 2825:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [], fail),
 2826:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [], fail)),
 2827:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [], fail)),
 2828:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [], fail)),
 2829:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [11], fail)),
 2830:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [11], fail)),
 2831:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [11], fail)),
 2832: 
 2833:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11], fail),
 2834:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11], fail)),
 2835:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11], fail)),
 2836:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5, 7], [11], fail)),
 2837:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11, 13], fail)),
 2838:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11, 13], fail)),
 2839:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11, 13], fail)),
 2840: 
 2841:     ok.
 2842: 
 2843: zipwith3_trim(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2844:     Zip = fun(A, B, C) -> A * B * C end,
 2845: 
 2846:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [], trim),
 2847:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [], trim),
 2848:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [], trim),
 2849:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [11], trim),
 2850:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [11], trim),
 2851:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [11], trim),
 2852: 
 2853:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11], trim),
 2854:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11], trim),
 2855:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11], trim),
 2856:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11, 13], trim),
 2857:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11, 13], trim),
 2858:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11, 13], trim),
 2859: 
 2860:     ok.

 2900:     F = fun(I) -> I rem 2 =:= 0 end,
 2901:     filpart(F, [], []),

 2903:     filpart(F, [1,3,17], []),

 2912: 
 2913: filpart(F, All, Exp) ->
 2914:     Exp = lists:filter(F, All),
 2915:     Other = lists:filter(fun(E) -> not F(E) end, All),
 2916:     {Exp,Other} = lists:partition(F, All).
 2917:

 3010:     true = lists:suffix([], [a,b,c]),
 3011:     true = lists:suffix([a], lists:duplicate(200000, a)),
 3012:     true = lists:suffix(lists:seq(1, 1024),
 3013: 			lists:seq(2, 64000) ++ lists:seq(1, 1024)),
 3014:     true = lists:suffix(lists:duplicate(20000, a),
 3015: 			lists:duplicate(200000, a)),
 3016:     true = lists:suffix([2.0,3.0], [1.0,2.0,3.0]),
 3017: 
 3018:     %% False cases.
 3019:     false = lists:suffix([a], []),
 3020:     false = lists:suffix([a,b,c], []),
 3021:     false = lists:suffix([a,b,c], [b,c]),
 3022:     false = lists:suffix([a,b,c], [a,b,c,a,b]),
 3023:     false = lists:suffix(lists:duplicate(199999, a)++[b],
 3024: 			 lists:duplicate(200000, a)),
 3025:     false = lists:suffix([2.0,3.0], [1,2,3]),
 3026: 
 3027:     %% Error cases.
 3028:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix({a,b,c}, [])),
 3029:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix([], {a,b})),
 3030:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix([a|b], [])),
 3031:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix([a,b|c], [a|b])),
 3032:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix([a|b], [a,b|c])),

 3037: %% Test lists:subtract/2 and the '--' operator.
 3038: subtract(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3039:     [] = sub([], []),
 3040:     [] = sub([], [a]),
 3041:     [] = sub([], lists:seq(1, 1024)),
 3042:     sub_non_matching([a], []),
 3043:     sub_non_matching([1,2], [make_ref()]),
 3044:     sub_non_matching(lists:seq(1, 1024), [make_ref(),make_ref()]),
 3045: 
 3046:     %% Matching subtracts.
 3047:     [] = sub([a], [a]),
 3048:     [a] = sub([a,b], [b]),
 3049:     [a] = sub([a,b], [b,c]),
 3050:     [a] = sub([a,b,c], [b,c]),
 3051:     [a] = sub([a,b,c], [b,c]),
 3052:     [d,a,a] = sub([a,b,c,d,a,a], [a,b,c]),
 3053:     [d,x,a] = sub([a,b,c,d,a,x,a], [a,b,c,a]),
 3054:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,9999,10000,20,21,22] =
 3055: 	sub(lists:seq(1, 10000)++[20,21,22], lists:seq(10, 9998)),
 3056: 
 3057:     %% ERL-986; an integer overflow relating to term comparison
 3058:     %% caused subtraction to be inconsistent.
 3059:     Ids = [2985095936,47540628,135460048,1266126295,240535295,
 3060:            115724671,161800351,4187206564,4178142725,234897063,
 3061:            14773162,6662515191,133150693,378034895,1874402262,
 3062:            3507611978,22850922,415521280,253360400,71683243],
 3063: 
 3064:     [] = id(Ids) -- id(Ids),
 3065: 
 3066:     %% Floats/integers.
 3067:     [42.0,42.0] = sub([42.0,42,42.0], [42,42,42]),
 3068:     [1,2,3,4,43.0] = sub([1,2,3,4,5,42.0,43.0], [42.0,5]),
 3069: 
 3070:     %% Crashing subtracts.
 3071:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([], [a|b])),
 3072:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a], [a|b])),
 3073:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a|b], [])),
 3074:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a|b], [])),
 3075:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a|b], [a])),
 3076: 
 3077:     %% Trapping, both crashing and otherwise.
 3078:     [sub_trapping(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 18)],
 3079: 
 3080:     %% The current implementation chooses which algorithm to use based on
 3081:     %% certain thresholds, and we need proper coverage for all corner cases.
 3082:     [sub_thresholds(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 32)],
 3083: 
 3084:     %% Trapping, both crashing and otherwise.
 3085:     [sub_trapping(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 18)],
 3086: 
 3087:     %% The current implementation chooses which algorithm to use based on
 3088:     %% certain thresholds, and we need proper coverage for all corner cases.
 3089:     [sub_thresholds(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 32)],
 3090: 
 3091:     ok.
 3092: 
 3093: id(I) -> I.
 3094: 
 3095: sub_non_matching(A, B) ->
 3096:     A = sub(A, B).
 3097: 
 3098: sub(A, B) ->
 3099:     Res = A -- B,
 3100:     Res = lists:subtract(A, B).
 3101: 
 3102: sub_trapping(N) ->
 3103:     List = lists:duplicate(N + (1 bsl N), gurka),
 3104:     ImproperList = List ++ crash,
 3105: 
 3106:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub_trapping_1(ImproperList, [])),
 3107:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub_trapping_1(List, ImproperList)),
 3108: 
 3109:     List = List -- lists:duplicate(N + (1 bsl N), gaffel),
 3110:     ok = sub_trapping_1(List, []).
 3111: 
 3112: sub_trapping_1([], _) -> ok;
 3113: sub_trapping_1(L, R) -> sub_trapping_1(L -- R, [gurka | R]).
 3114: 
 3115: sub_thresholds(N) ->
 3116:     %% This needs to be long enough to cause trapping.
 3117:     OtherLen = 1 bsl 18,
 3118:     Other = lists:seq(0, OtherLen - 1),
 3119: 
 3120:     Disjoint = lists:seq(-N, -1),
 3121:     Subset = lists:seq(1, N),
 3122: 
 3123:     %% LHS is disjoint from RHS, so all elements must be retained.
 3124:     Disjoint = Disjoint -- Other,
 3125: 
 3126:     %% LHS is covered by RHS, so all elements must be removed.
 3127:     [] = Subset -- Other,
 3128: 
 3129:     %% RHS is disjoint from LHS, so all elements must be retained.
 3130:     Other = Other -- Disjoint,
 3131: 
 3132:     %% RHS is covered by LHS, so N elements must be removed.
 3133:     N = OtherLen - length(Other -- Subset),
 3134: 
 3135:     ok.
 3136:

 3160: %% Briefly test the common high-order functions to ensure they
 3161: %% are covered.
 3162: hof(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3163:     L = [1,2,3],
 3164:     [1,4,9] = lists:map(fun(N) -> N*N end, L),
 3165:     [1,4,5,6] = lists:flatmap(fun(1) -> [1];
 3166: 				 (2) -> [];
 3167: 				 (3) -> [4,5,6]
 3168: 			      end, L),
 3169:     [{1,[a]},{2,[b]},{3,[c]}] =
 3170: 	lists:keymap(fun(A) -> [A] end, 2, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]),
 3171: 
 3172:     [1,3] = lists:filter(fun(N) -> N rem 2 =:= 1 end, L),
 3173:     FilterMapFun = fun(1) -> true;
 3174: 		      (2) -> {true,42};
 3175: 		      (3) -> false
 3176: 		   end,
 3177:     [1,42] = lists:filtermap(FilterMapFun, L),
 3178:     [1,42] = lists:zf(FilterMapFun, L),
 3179: 
 3180:     [3,2,1] = lists:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [E|A] end, [], L),
 3181:     [1,2,3] = lists:foldr(fun(E, A) -> [E|A] end, [], L),
 3182:     {[1,4,9],[3,2,1]} = lists:mapfoldl(fun(E, A) ->
 3183: 					       {E*E,[E|A]}
 3184: 				       end, [], L),
 3185:     {[1,4,9],[1,2,3]} = lists:mapfoldr(fun(E, A) ->
 3186: 					       {E*E,[E|A]}
 3187: 				       end, [], L),
 3188: 
 3189:     true = lists:any(fun(N) -> N =:= 2 end, L),
 3190:     false = lists:any(fun(N) -> N =:= 42 end, L),
 3191: 
 3192:     true = lists:all(fun(N) -> is_integer(N) end, L),
 3193:     false = lists:all(fun(N) -> N rem 2 =:= 0 end, L),
 3194: 
 3195:     ok.

 3230:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = catch lists:enumerate(<<1>>, <<2>>, [a,b,c]),

 3236: 
 3237: error_info(_Config) ->
 3238:     L = [{keyfind, [whatever, bad_position, bad_list], [{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 3239:          {keymember, [key, 0, bad_list], [{2,".*"}, {3,".*"}]},
 3240:          {keysearch, [key, bad_position, {no,list}], [{2,".*"}, {3,".*"}]},
 3241:          {member, [whatever, not_a_list]},
 3242:          {member, [whatever, [a|b]]},
 3243:          {reverse, [not_a_list, whatever]}
 3244:         ],
 3245:     do_error_info(L).
 3246: 
 3247: do_error_info(L0) ->
 3248:     L1 = lists:foldl(fun({_,A}, Acc) when is_integer(A) -> Acc;
 3249:                         ({F,A}, Acc) -> [{F,A,[]}|Acc];
 3250:                         ({F,A,Opts}, Acc) -> [{F,A,Opts}|Acc]
 3251:                      end, [], L0),
 3252:     Tests = ordsets:from_list([{F,length(A)} || {F,A,_} <- L1] ++
 3253:                                   [{F,A} || {F,A} <- L0, is_integer(A)]),
 3254:     Bifs0 = [{F,A} || {M,F,A} <- erlang:system_info(snifs),
 3255:                       M =:= lists,
 3256:                       A =/= 0],
 3257:     Bifs = ordsets:from_list(Bifs0),
 3258:     NYI = [{F,lists:duplicate(A, '*'),nyi} || {F,A} <- Bifs -- Tests],
 3259:     L = lists:sort(NYI ++ L1),
 3260:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(lists, L, [snifs_only]).
 3261: 
 3262: uniq_1(_Config) ->
 3263:     [] = lists:uniq([]),
 3264:     [foo] = lists:uniq([foo]),
 3265:     ["foo", "bar", "zoo"] = lists:uniq(["foo", "foo", "bar", "foo", "zoo",
 3266:                                         "foo", "bar", "zoo"]),
 3267:     [a, 1, b, 2] = lists:uniq([a, a, a, 1, b, 2, a, 2, 1]),
 3268:     [<<"home">>, "home"] = lists:uniq([<<"home">>, "home"]),
 3269:     [3.14159, 2.71828, 3.17] = lists:uniq([3.14159, 3.14159, 2.71828, 3.17]),
 3270:     [42, 42.0] = lists:uniq([42, 42.0, 42, 42.0]),
 3271:     ok.
 3272: 
 3273: uniq_2(_Config) ->
 3274:     [] = lists:uniq(fun(X) -> X end, []),
 3275:     [{42, 1}, {42.0, 99}, {a, 99}] =
 3276:         lists:uniq(fun(X) -> element(1, X) end,
 3277:                    [{42, 1}, {42.0, 99}, {a, 99}, {a, 1}, {42, 100}]),
 3278:     [1] = lists:uniq(fun(_) -> whatever end, lists:seq(1, 10)),
 3279:     ok.
